item.title: React | Simple implementing SSR(Server-Side Rendering) in React
item.description: Hello! My name is Clark, in this post we are gonna implementing Server-Side Rendering in React, itâ€™s very easy! Letâ€™s start! Server-Sideâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Hello! My name is Clark, in this post we are gonna implementing Server-Side Rendering in React, itâ€™s very easy! Letâ€™s start!

Server-Side Rendering vs Client-Side Rendering

What different between SSR and CSR? first, the CSR have a few step on page of web loading:

  1. Load HTML file, It usually likes this: 

    <html>
  <body>
    <div id="root"></div>
    <script src="./bundle.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>
  2. Download JavaScript bundle.js.
  3. Last, execute bundle.js and render page view by route!

On the other hand, SSR have these step:

  1. Send request to NodeJS server when type the URL.
  2. Server would be generate the view of page by request URL path, and response to client side.

  3. Client accept the response from server, It likes:

    <html>
  <body>
    <div id="root">
      <!--
        Page information
      -->
    </div>
    <script src="./bundle.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>
  4. Download JavaScript bundle.js.
  5. Last, execute bundle.js and render page view by route!

Now you can according to above loading step of about CSR and SSR find out a key thing! did you find that?

Yes! The different just is action before Download JavaScript bundle.js. this step.

So in the face, we just need prepare Server for the first load, itâ€™s very easy!

And before the start, I have ready a basic CSR project of react, you can clone it from my Github, when you cloned you can execute it, and find it first loading hasnâ€™t any content on page

Right now, following step to implement SSR to this project!

Create server by NodeJS

First of all, for the SSR we must use express server library of NodeJS, why I chooses NodeJS? because just only NodeJS can implement SSR, They are all JavaScript.

Install express

Install express in origin CSR project.

npm install express --save

Then add the server.js in src folder, and write follow code:

import express from 'express';

// (1)
const app = express();
const port = process.env.PORT || 3001;

// (2)
app.use(express.static('dist'));

// (3)
app.get('*', (req, res) => {

  //(4)
  const content = '<div>Response Content</div>';
  res.send(content);

});

app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Listening on port: ${port}`);
});
  1. Create express object, and Setting folder position of static file.
  2. Setting folder position of static file.
  3. Route entrance, if setting â€™*â€™ then any route would be execute callback function, and callback have two parameter, the first is information of request(example path), the second is method of response.
  4. Setting content of page, and use res.send response to client-side.

Ok! we have gone finish the server part, but this response of server in not we expect, we want the content is according to router render correspond component.

So we need a helper, it can help render first content same as CSR.

Rendering content for first response

Please create new folder in src folder, it name is helper, and create a file in this, new file name is renderer.js, last write follow code into it:

import React from 'react';
import { renderToString } from 'react-dom/server';
import { StaticRouter } from 'react-router';
import { renderRoutes } from 'react-router-config';
import Routes from '../Routes';

export default (req) => {
  // (1)
  const content = renderToString(
    <StaticRouter location={req.path}>
      <div>{renderRoutes(Routes)}</div>
    </StaticRouter>,
  );

  // (2)
  return `
    <html>
      <body>
        <div id="root">${content}</div>
        <script src="./bundle.js"></script>
      </body>
    </html>
  `;
};

Letâ€™s look What did it do:

  1. The content is according to router rendering correspond content, it have two points:

    The first is StaticRouter, it is kind of router like as HashRouter and BrowserRouter, we can use it, when route never change(Document of StaticRouter).

    The second is Routes from â€˜../Routesâ€™, because same of all content of page, whether rendered from client or server, so we can reuse it.

  2. Because the first loading is from server-side in SSR, so we have to prepare basic HTML for after â€˜.bundle.jsâ€™, then when â€˜.bundle.jsâ€™ loaded just can continue support actions for operating of user.

    You can image it is for origin â€˜./dist/index.htmlâ€™ instead.

Now we have finished â€˜./src/helper/renderer.jsâ€™, next back to â€˜./src/server.jsâ€™ to use it:

import renderer from './helpers/renderer';

...

app.get('*', (req, res) => {
  // Call renderer get content by `req` parameter
  const content = renderer(req);

  // Would content send to client
  res.send(content);
});

...

Setting Webpack to build server

We have already finished all about code! we need setting Webpack now, let it can build server, first open â€˜./webpack.config.jsâ€™, it config is for build client code(â€˜./src/client.jsâ€™), we have to create new config of Webpack for build server.

So create new file in root, and name is â€˜webpack.server.jsâ€™, and copy content of â€˜./webpack.config.jsâ€™ to new file modify something:

./webpack.server.js

const path = require('path');
// (1)
const webpackNodeExternals = require('webpack-node-externals');

module.exports = {
  // (2)
  target: 'node',
  // (3)
  entry: ['@babel/polyfill', './src/server.js'],
  // (4)
  externals: [webpackNodeExternals()],
  output: {
    filename: 'bundle.js',
    // (5)
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, './build'),
  },
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /.js$/,
        use: {
          loader: 'babel-loader',
          options: {
            presets: ['@babel/preset-react', '@babel/preset-env'],
          },
        },
      },
    ],
  },
};

I modified something:

  1. Install webpack-node-externals from npm:

    npm i webpack-node-externals

    When build on server, not need contain node_modules, so we can use webpack-node-externals ignore this on building.

  2. Server running environment is Node, It have some different setting with browser when build, so have to defined this.
  3. Modify entry file from â€˜./src/client.jsâ€™ to â€˜./src/server.jsâ€™.
  4. Use the first step installed webpack-node-externals to externals.
  5. Defined new folder(different with client code) to put build file of server code.

Then we could rename â€˜./webpack.config.jsâ€™ to â€˜./webpack.client.jsâ€™.

Build and running

Finally, add and modify content on script of â€˜package.jsonâ€™:

package.json

"scripts": {
  "build-client": "webpack --config webpack.client.js",
  "build-server": "webpack --config webpack.server.js",
  "build": "npm run build-client && npm run build-server",
  "server": "node build/bundle.js"
},

Running script of build:

Running server:

npm run server

Then open browser, and type localhost:3001 to url, and look at the response on first loading:

The first response have complete content, next would bundle.js(client code) download, after download, then execute process all by client side, server just only be responsible for first render!

Above about SSR code would find in my GitHub,

Conclusion

The base SSR is not difficult, just prepare little server code and setting for server render, in the future, I will write SSR about react-redux.

Thank for reading my post, if you have any question and think, please let me know, in comments below :)

var maxSubArray = function(nums) {

  const maxSum = currentSum = nums[0];

é€™å€‹è§£æ³•çš„ Bug åœ¨æ–¼ç¬¬å››æ¬¡è¿´åœˆï¼Œå› ç‚º 4 ä¹‹å¾Œæ‰€æœ‰çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½ä¸æœƒæ¯” 4 é‚„å¤§ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ currentSum æœƒä¸€ç›´è¢«æ­¸ 0ï¼Œä¸­æ–·èˆ‡ä¸‹æ¬¡çš„åŠ ç¸½ï¼Œå°è‡´æ²’è¾¦æ³•ç®—åˆ° 4 + -1 + 3 é€™å€‹æ›´å¤§çš„çµæœï¼ŒmaxSum ä¹Ÿæ°¸é æ˜¯ 4ã€‚

å¾Œä¾†åˆå¤šæƒ³äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œæ±ºå®šå°‡åˆ¤æ–·çš„éƒ¨åˆ†æ”¹æˆ

å¦‚æœ currentSum åŠ ä¸Š num[i]ï¼Œåè€Œå°æ–¼ num[i]ï¼Œé‚£å°±æŠŠ currentSum æ”¹æˆ num[i]

å› ç‚ºå‰é¢çš„ currentSum åŠ ä¸Š num[i]ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æœƒè®“ currentSum è®Šå¾—æ¯” num[i] æ›´å¤§ï¼Œé‚£å°±ä¸å¦‚ä¸è¦å‰é¢é‚£äº›ç¸½è¨ˆäº†ï¼Œç›´æ¥æŠŠ currentSum æ”¹æˆ num[i] ç¹¼çºŒåŠ ç¸½ï¼Œè€Œåœ¨ currentSum æ¯æ¬¡åŠ ç¸½å®Œä¹Ÿéƒ½å’Œç•¶å‰çš„ maxSum æ¯”è¼ƒä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ¯”è¼ƒå¤§çš„è©±å°±æ›´æ–° maxSumã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥è§£æ³•æœ€å¾Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

var maxSubArray = function(nums) {
  let currentSum = maxSum = nums[0];

  for(let i = 1; i < nums.length; i += 1) {
    currentSum += nums[i];
    if (currentSum < nums[i]) {
      currentSum = nums[i];
    }

    if (currentSum > maxSum) {
      maxSum = currentSum;
    }

  return maxSum;
};

é‡é»å°±åœ¨æ–¼ if(surrentSum < nums[i]) é€™ä¸€è¡Œåˆ¤æ–·ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆç«‹çš„è©±å°±ç›´æ¥æŠŠ surrentSum è¨­å®šæˆæ›´å¤§çš„ nums[i]ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹ä¾†å°±åªè¦ä¸€ç›´åŠ ä¸‹ä¸€å€‹å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç„¶å¾Œèˆ‡ maxSum æ¯”è¼ƒï¼Œæ¯”è¼ƒå¤§çš„è©±å°±æ›´æ–°ï¼Œæ¯”è¼ƒå°çš„è©±å°±ä¸å‹•ã€‚

å› ç‚ºåªè·‘ä¸€æ¬¡é™£åˆ—è£¡é¢çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…§å®¹ï¼Œæ™‚é–“è¤‡é›œåº¦æ‡‰è©²æ˜¯ O(n)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆç¸¾ç®—æ˜¯é‚„ä¸éŒ¯ï¼š


ä½†å¯ä¸æ˜¯é€™æ¨£å­å°±çµæŸäº†ï¼

åœ¨é€™é“é¡Œç›®çš„è§£é‡‹å¾Œé¢å•Šï¼Œé‚„æœ‰é™„ä¸Šé€™éº¼ä¸€å¥è©±ï¼š

If you have figured out the O(n) solution, try coding another solution using the divide and conquer approach, which is more subtle.

item.title: Vue | My first unit testing of Vue.js with Jest and @testing-library
item.description: Hello! My name is Clark! On this post, weâ€™re gonna write test case for component of Vue.js with Jest and @testing-library, letâ€™s we startsâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Hello! My name is Clark! On this post, weâ€™re gonna write test case for component of Vue.js with Jest and @testing-library, letâ€™s we starts ğŸ˜ƒ!

Create Vue project

First of all, Even though I am sharing about test case of Vue.js on this post, but actually I more familiar ReactJS than Vue.js, so Iâ€™ll use Vue-CLI Create my first Vue project fast.

Install Vue-CLI

npm install -g @vue/cli

Create project

vue create hello-world

When after input vue create hello-world, The CLI tool would ask you if need other library:

But we donâ€™t need, so pick default, let it start create project. When after creating, you can checks current path if emerge the project:

Or at the path of project, execute cmd on terminal to open local server:

npm run serve

Open browser and input url http://localhost:8080/:

Okay, now we were has a project let we start unit testing!

Install library about unit testing

I choices Jest and @testing-library to test Vue.js.

But why not pick @vue/test-utils? According to introduction of @testing-library:

The core library has been wrapped to provide ergonomic APIs for several frameworks, including React, Angular, and Vue. There is also a plugin to use testing-library queries for end-to-end tests in Cypress and an implementation for React Native.

So @testing-library build a library for component of test or manipulation, whatever the component is from to Vue.JS or ReactJS or Angular!

As Far as Iâ€™m concerned, this is a very convenient to let me write unit testing between ReactJS and Vue.js.

First of all on this stage, we must install above core library for unit testing:

npm install jest @testing-library/vue --save-dev

Next, we can create a __tests__ folder in project root path, and create a HelloWorld.test.js in that, then just try to write first case of unit testing.

For example, our target of test component is HelloWorld.vue, then this content is:

./src/component/HelloWorld.vue

<template>
  <div class="hello">
    <h1>{{ msg }}</h1>
    <p>
      For a guide and recipes on how to configure / customize this project,<br>
      check out the
      <a href="https://cli.vuejs.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener">vue-cli documentation</a>.
    </p>

    /* The some tag be omitted... */

  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'HelloWorld',
  props: {
    msg: String
  }
}
</script>

Okay, when I use this component, I hope to if I give it the props msg, it will be render this text, then this text will be display by h1, so I add attribute test-dataid for h1:

<h1 data-testid="title">{{ msg }}</h1>

When testing we can find it by queries of @testing-library provide, so the case of unit testing can write:

./tests/HelloWorld.test.js

// import library of unit testing library
import { render } from '@testing-library/vue';
import HelloWorld from '../src/components/HelloWorld.vue';

// The case of unit testing for check render msg
test('Check if render props msg text in HelloWorld', async () => {
  const { getByTestId, } = render(HelloWorld,{
    props: { msg: 'Hello, My name is Clark!', },
  })

  const title = getByTestId('title');

  expect(title.innerHTML).toBe('Hello, My name is Clark!');
})

On Vue.js, render of @testing-library can have two parameters, first is component also our target of test, the second is content of props with use component, and render would be return all kinds of queries(ex. ByLabelText, ByTextâ€¦in detail), the above getByTestId also contain this queries, it can queries data-testid.

When we find h1 tag, then can use innerHTML to check if this text same of msg of props.

So far, we have to make some preparations before test, install about compiler library of Vue.js for NodeJS execute test and config of jest:

npm i babel-jest jest-vue vue-jest --save-dev

Open the package.json and add the new scripts and config of jest:

./package.json

"scripts": {
  "serve": "vue-cli-service serve",
  "build": "vue-cli-service build",
  "lint": "vue-cli-service lint",
  "test": "jest" // Add this script for test
},
"jest": {
  "moduleFileExtensions": [
    "js",
    "vue"
  ],
  "transform": {
    "^.+\\.js$": "babel-jest",
    ".*\\.vue$": "<rootDir>/node_modules/vue-jest"
  },
  "moduleNameMapper": {
    "^@/(.*)$": "<rootDir>/src/$1"
  }
},

At last, execute unit testing by npm scripts:

npm run test

Resultâ€¦

â€¦Oh my god! have a error happened! whatâ€™s wrong with it? Ummâ€¦donâ€™t worry! it fine! I was find out this issue:

Unknown option: base.configFile error when running tests

According to it, solution is:

So I just do that, and run test when I does:

It works, and test is PASS! âœ¨

Thanks guys for reading this post, if you have any question or find out ant wrong in the post, please submit discussion for me! ğŸ˜ƒ

item.title: Jest | Use Jest write unit testing for DOM manipulation
item.description: Hello I am Clark! Today weâ€™re gonna write test case of unit testing for DOM manipulation. If we have a piece code of HTML and JavaScript inâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Hello I am Clark! Today weâ€™re gonna write test case of unit testing for DOM manipulation.

If we have a piece code of HTML and JavaScript in one index.html file, this is a todo list:

<html>
  <body>
    <input id="newTodo" />
    <button onclick="addTodo()">Add todo</button>
    <ol id="todoList"></ol>
    <script>
      const addTodo = () => {
        const newTodoInput = document.getElementById('newTodo');
        let currentTodoList = document.getElementById('todoList').innerHTML;
        currentTodoList += `<li>${newTodoInput.value}</li>`;
        document.getElementById('todoList').innerHTML = currentTodoList;
        newTodoInput.value = '';
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

Ummâ€¦this todo list give people quite donâ€™t know how to write test case, because this code confuse DOM with logic of JavaScript, so first of all, we should would logic of control todo list disassemble from index.html:

<html>
  <body>
    <input id="newTodo" />
    <button id="addTodo">Add todo</button>
    <ol id="todoList"></ol>

    <script type="text/javascript" src="./todolist.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

About logic of todo list move to todoList.js file:

const addTodo = () => {
  const newTodoInput = document.getElementById('newTodo');
  let currentTodoList = document.getElementById('todoList').innerHTML;
  currentTodoList += `<li>${newTodoInput.value}</li>`;
  document.getElementById('todoList').innerHTML = currentTodoList;
  newTodoInput.value = '';
}

document.getElementById('addTodo').addEventListener('click', addTodo);

Right now, view is view, logic is logic, so we can very easy to write test case for JavaScript, butâ€¦we no have DOM, how to trigger addTodo? yes! so we must ready DOM for test case of addTodo!

As mention document of Jest:

Jest ships with jsdom which simulates a DOM environment as if you were in the browser. This means that every DOM API that we call can be observed in the same way it would be observed in a browser!

So we can very easy to simulates a DOM environment when use Jest, get start install Jest and write test case!

Install Jest in project(If you have no npm or NodeJS environment, must download Node when before start):

npm inatall jest

Next, we add file todoList.test.js and write a test case:

test('Check addTodo able add todo to todoList', () => {
  
});

Like above name of test case, I want test function addTodo can be real add todo to todoList.

Iâ€™ve divided write test case into three parts:

  1. We have to find out which elements is addTodo need? letâ€™s look at todoList.js,first we need a button of id is addTodo, we will would add click event of addTodo for it, also need a input of id is newTodo, last we need a ol of id is todoList to display todo list.

    Yes! just three elements is addTodo need! we donâ€™t care other elements in the HTML file, we just only prepare those for test case:

test('Check addTodo able add todo to todoList', () => {
  document.body.innerHTML = `
    <input id="newTodoInput" />
    <button id="addTodoBtn">Add todo</button>
    <ol id="todoList"></ol>
  `;
});
  1. Use require import todoList.js file add logic to elements of readied, it have logic of addTodo, it is we target of test in test case too:
test('Check addTodo able add todo to todoList', () => {
  document.body.innerHTML = `
    <input id="newTodoInput" />
    <button id="addTodoBtn">Add todo</button>
    <ol id="todoList"></ol>
  `;
  require('../todolist.js');
});
  1. Use selector get element, write new todo name input and trigger addTodo by button, then check if innerHTML of ol correct add new todo!
test('Check addTodo able add todo to todoList', () => {
  document.body.innerHTML = `
    <input id="newTodoInput" />
    <button id="addTodoBtn">Add todo</button>
    <ol id="todoList"></ol>
  `;
  require('../todolist.js');

  const newTodoInput = document.getElementById('newTodoInput');
  const addTodoBtn = document.getElementById('addTodoBtn');
  const todolist = document.getElementById('todoList');

  newTodoInput.value = 'New todolist!';
  addTodoBtn.click();

  expect(todolist.innerHTML).toBe('<li>New todolist!</li>');
});

Now weâ€™re finish first test case for todoList.js! letâ€™s execute test check if logic correct:

Thanks guys for reading this post, if you have any question or find out ant wrong in the post, please submit discussion for me! ğŸ˜ƒ

  1. å› ç‚ºç¬¬äºŒå€‹æ¸¬è©¦æ¡ˆä¾‹çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œç™¼ç¾å®ƒçµ¦çš„é™£åˆ—ä¸ä¸€å®šæœƒç”±å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åºï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€é–‹å§‹å…ˆç‚ºé™£åˆ—ä»¥æ¯å€‹å…ƒç´ çš„èµ·å§‹æ•¸å­—åšæ’åºã€‚
  2. é€éè¿´åœˆåˆ¤æ–·éœ€ä¸éœ€è¦è¢«åˆä½µï¼Œæˆ–æ˜¯ç›´æ¥ç§»é™¤ä¸‹ä¸€å€‹å…ƒç´ ã€‚

è§£æ³•ï¼š

var merge = function(intervals) {
  if (intervals.length === 0) return [];
  let workIntervals = intervals.sort((a, b) => a[0] - b[0]);
  const result = [workIntervals.shift()];
    
  while(workIntervals.length > 0) {
    const lastIndex = result.length - 1;
    const [intervalStart, intervalEnd] = workIntervals[0];
    if (result[lastIndex][1] >= intervalEnd) {
      workIntervals.shift();
    } else if (result[lastIndex][1] >= intervalStart) {
      result[lastIndex][1] = intervalEnd;
      workIntervals.slice(1);
    } else {
      result.push(workIntervals.shift());
    }
  }
  return result;
};

  3. æœ€å¾Œæ˜¯å¦‚æœéƒ½æ²’æœ‰é‡ç–Šï¼Œé‚£å°±ç›´æ¥æŠŠä¸‹ä¸€å€‹å…ƒç´ ä¸åšè™•ç†æ”¾é€²çµæœè£¡é¢ã€‚

ä½œè€…æƒ³è¡¨é”ç¾åœ¨çš„ä»–å’Œé–‹å§‹æ™‚ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œå°è‡ªå·±åœ¨åšçš„äº‹æƒ…æ„Ÿåˆ°å¿«æ¨‚ï¼ä¸”åŒæ¨£æƒ³è¦æ¿€å‹µå„ä½åœ¨ 2020 å¹´ã€Œæ„›ä¸Šæ”¹è®Šï¼Œä¸”ç¹¼çºŒå‘å‰é‚é€²ï¼ã€

å› æ­¤é€™æ˜¯å¾ˆæ£’çš„æ©Ÿæœƒï¼Œå°¤å…¶æ˜¯åœ¨æˆ‘æˆç‚ºå‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸«å¾Œçš„ç¬¬ä¸€å¹´ï¼Œæƒ³é€éé€™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« æª¢è¦–è‡ªå·±æ˜¯å¦å’Œä¸€å¹´å‰ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œç†±æ„›å‰ç«¯æŠ€è¡“ä¸”å……æ»¿ç†±æƒ…ï¼

å°±å¦‚åŒæ¨™é¡Œæ‰€æåˆ°çš„ï¼å…¶å¯¦æˆ‘æˆç‚ºå‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸«ä¹Ÿæ‰çŸ­çŸ­çš„ä¸€å¹´è€Œå·²ï¼Œè€Œä¸”çœŸæ­£é–‹å§‹å­¸ React é€™å€‹æ¡†æ¶æ˜¯åœ¨ 2018 å¹´çš„éµäººè³½ï¼Œç”¨ã€Œä¸€æ­¥ä¸€è…³å°çš„ React æ—…ç¨‹ã€å­¸æœƒçš„ï¼ˆæ–‡ç« å…§å®¹ç›¸ç•¶ç²—ç³™ï¼Œæ…å…¥ ğŸ˜‚ï¼‰

å› ç‚ºç•¶æ™‚çš„å·¥ä½œæ˜¯ç”¨ ASP.NETï¼Œæ²’è¾¦æ³•è®“æˆ‘æ›´æ·±å…¥ç·´ç¿’ React çš„æ‡‰ç”¨æŠ€å·§ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é›–ç„¶èƒ½åŠ›é‚„å¾ˆèœï¼Œä½†ä»ç„¶æŠŠå¿ƒä¸€æ©«ï¼Œæ€’æ¥å€‹æ¡ˆå­ä¾†åšï¼Œç„¶å¾Œåœ¨åœ˜éšŠè£¡å°ˆé–€è² è²¬å‰ç«¯çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¡†æ¶ç•¶ç„¶ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ Reactã€‚

åœ¨å°ˆæ¡ˆçš„åŸ·è¡ŒæœŸé–“ä¹Ÿè€ƒæ…®éå¾ˆå¤šäº‹æƒ…ï¼Œå°è±¡æ¯”è¼ƒæ·±åˆ»çš„å¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯é‚£æ™‚å€™æä¸æ¸…æ¥šç‚ºä»€éº¼ Store åœ¨æ¯å€‹å°ˆæ¡ˆä¸­åªèƒ½æœ‰ä¸€å€‹ï¼Œé‚„æœ‰ç”¨ redux-thunk è§£æ±ºäº†åœ¨ Redux ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨éåŒæ­¥çš„å•é¡Œã€‚ç¸½ä¹‹å°±æ˜¯ä¸æŒºä¸çŸ¥é“ï¼ŒæŒºéäº†å°±æœƒæ„Ÿå—åˆ°è‡ªå·±èƒ½åŠ›çš„æå‡ï¼Œå› æ­¤

å¯¦æˆ°ç¶“é©—çœŸçš„å¾ˆé‡è¦ï¼

å·¥ä½œ

èªªåˆ°å·¥ä½œä¹ŸçœŸçš„éå¸¸å¹¸é‹ï¼Œæˆ‘å±¥æ­·æŠ•äº†å…©é–“ç”¨ React é–‹ç™¼çš„æ–°å‰µï¼Œä¹Ÿéƒ½æœ‰é€šéé¢è©¦æ‹¿åˆ° offerï¼Œè€Œé€™å…©é–“éƒ½æ˜¯æœ‹å‹åœ¨ Facebook çš„ç¤¾ç¾¤è£¡çœ‹è¦‹çš„å¾µæ‰è³‡è¨Šï¼Œç„¶å¾Œè½‰è²¼çµ¦æˆ‘ï¼Œå¯ä»¥èªªæ²’æœ‰ä»–å€‘å°±æ²’æœ‰ç¾åœ¨çš„æˆ‘ ğŸ˜­

å…©é–“çš„é¢è©¦éç¨‹å…¶å¯¦å·®ä¸å¤šï¼éƒ½æ˜¯èŠå¤©å±…å¤šï¼Œæˆ‘æƒ³å¯èƒ½æ˜¯å› ç‚ºæ–°å‰µå…¬å¸æ¯”è¼ƒé‡è¦–äººæ ¼ç‰¹è³ªï¼Œå°±æ²’æœ‰ç‰¹åˆ¥å°æŠ€è¡“å¦å¤–åšæ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œå€¼å¾—ä¸€æçš„æ˜¯ä»–å€‘éƒ½å¾ˆä½©æœã€Œç¶“ç‡Ÿéƒ¨è½æ ¼æ’°å¯«æŠ€è¡“æ–‡ç« ã€é€™ä»¶äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œèªç‚ºé€™æ˜¯ä¸€ç¨®å°æ–¼ã€Œç†±æƒ…ã€çš„å±•ç¾ï¼Œåœ¨æ²’æœ‰äººè¦ä½ é€™éº¼åšï¼Œé€¼ä½ ä¸€å®šè¦ç”¢å‡ºæ–‡ç« çš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹ï¼Œä½ é‚„æ˜¯æœƒåš

é‚£å°±æ˜¯å› ç‚ºä½ çœŸçš„å–œæ­¡ï¼

Person å…§è£¡é¢æœ‰ä¸‰è¡Œç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ï¼Œä¾†çœ‹çœ‹å®ƒå€‘åˆ†åˆ¥æ˜¯ä»€éº¼ï¼š

æœ‰æ²’æœ‰ç…¥ç„¶ä¸€æ–°çš„æ„Ÿè¦ºï¼Ÿç”¨ Class ä¾†å®£å‘Š Constructor åœ¨èªç¾©ä¸Šé¢æœƒæ›´æ¸…æ¥šï¼Œä¸åƒä¹‹å‰åªèƒ½é€éå­—é¦–çš„å¤§å°å¯«ä¾†åˆ¤æ–·æ˜¯å¦ç‚º Constructor ï¼Œä¸”é‚„æœ‰å¯èƒ½æœƒæœ‰æœªéµç…§è¦å‰‡å°è‡´ä½¿ç”¨éŒ¯èª¤çš„æƒ…æ³ç™¼ç”Ÿã€‚

é€é new å‘¼å«æ™‚å‚³å…¥çš„åƒæ•¸æœƒç”± Class å…§çš„ constructor çµ¦æ¥æ”¶ï¼Œä¸¦åœ¨åŒä¸€å€å¡Šå»ºç«‹ Public Properties ï¼Œè€Œ Method çš„éƒ¨åˆ†å‰‡æ˜¯åœ¨ constructor å¤–åšæè¿°æˆ–å­˜å–è³‡æ–™ï¼Œ Private Value å°±å­˜æ”¾åœ¨ Method ä¸­ï¼Œä¾ç„¶ç„¡æ³•å¾ Instance ä¸­å–å¾—ã€‚

ç„¶å¾Œé€™é‚Šæ˜¯å€‹å¾ˆæ£’çš„æ™‚é–“ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®“æˆ‘å€‘é©—è­‰ Class çš„æ“ä½œæ˜¯å¦ä»ç„¶ç‚º Prototype ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯é€é Constructor å»ºç«‹çš„ Instance ï¼Œæ‡‰è©²æœƒæ“æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„ Prototype ï¼š

透過 Constructor 建立的 Instance ，會擁有相同的 Prototype

Inheritance

ç¹¼æ‰¿çš„è©±åœ¨ Class ä¸Šä¹Ÿè®Šå¾—æ–¹ä¾¿è¨±å¤šï¼Œæƒ³ç•¶åˆå¦‚æœè¦ Constructor ä¸Šè™•ç†ç¹¼æ‰¿ï¼Œå°±å¾—ä½¿ç”¨ call åœ¨ Constructor å‰µå»º Instance æ™‚ä¾†æŒ‡å®š this å‘¼å«å¦ä¸€å€‹ Constructorï¼Œåƒæ˜¯é€™æ¨£å­ï¼š

function Person(name) {

  const state = 'Taiwan';

}

function Employee(name, position) {
  // å°‡ this é€çµ¦ Person å»ºç«‹ properties
  Person.call(this, name);

const luck = new Employee('Luck', 'Front-end');

console.log(luck.getFrom()); // Luck from Taiwan.
console.log(luck.getPosition()); // Luck's position is the Front-end.

çœ‹èµ·ä¾†æœ‰äº›è¤‡é›œäº†å°å§ï¼Ÿä½†å¦‚æœæ˜¯ Class åªéœ€è¦åˆ©ç”¨ extends å’Œ super ä¾¿å¯è¼•é¬†è™•ç† Constructor é–“çš„ Inheritance ï¼š

class Person {

  getFrom() {

// ä½¿ç”¨ extends æŒ‡å®š parent class
class Employee extends Person {
  constructor(name, position) {

    super(name);

ä¸Šæ–¹åœ¨å®šç¾© Employee æ™‚å¦å¤–ç”¨äº† extends æŒ‡å®šäº† Person ï¼Œé€™éº¼ä¸€ä¾†å°±ç­‰æ–¼æ˜¯ç¹¼æ‰¿äº† Person çš„ Properties å’Œ Method ï¼Œä½†ç‚ºä»€éº¼åœ¨ Employee ä¸­çš„ constructor ä¸­é‚„è¦ä½¿ç”¨ super æŠŠ name å‚³çµ¦ Person å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

å› ç‚º Employee ä¸­ä¹Ÿæœ‰ constructor

ç•¶å­é¡åˆ¥è‡ªèº«ä¹Ÿéœ€è¦é€é constructor å»ºç«‹ Properties æ™‚ï¼Œå°±éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ super å¦å¤–æŒ‡å®šè¦é€çµ¦çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥çš„å€¼ï¼Œå¦å‰‡å°± Person ä¾†èªªï¼Œå‰µå»º Instance æ™‚å°‡å…©å€‹å€¼é€å…¥ Employee ï¼Œ Person æ ¹æœ¬ä¸æ›‰å¾—å“ªä¸€å€‹æ‰æ˜¯è¦è¢«æŒ‡å®šæˆ name çš„è³‡æ–™ï¼Œé€™è£¡å¤§å®¶å¯ä»¥æƒ³åƒæˆæ˜¯ç”¨ call ä¾†å‘¼å«å¦ä¸€å€‹ Constructor çš„æ„Ÿè¦ºã€‚

ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯èªªäº†ï¼Œå¦‚æœç•¶ä»Šå¤©ä¸éœ€è¦é€é Employee å‰µå»º Properties ï¼Œåƒ…åƒ…æ˜¯å¢åŠ  Methodï¼Œé‚£ super å°±å¯ä»¥çœç•¥ï¼Œå› ç‚ºæ‰€æœ‰çš„åƒæ•¸éƒ½æœƒæ˜¯çµ¦ Person çš„ï¼š

class Person {
  constructor(name) {
    this.name = name;
  }
  
  getFrom() {
    const state = 'Taiwan';
    return `${this.name} from ${state}.`
  }

class Employee extends Person {

  }
}

const luck = new Employee('Luck');

console.log(luck.getFrom()); // Luck from Taiwan.
console.log(luck.sayHello()); // Hello!I am Luck!

æœ€å¾Œè¨˜å¾—é‚£å€‹å¯æ€•çš„ Super Callï¼ˆè¶…å‘¼å«ï¼‰å—ï¼Ÿç•¶å­é¡åˆ¥çš„ Method è¦å‘¼å«çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥çš„ Method åŸ·è¡Œå°±å« Super Call ï¼Œåœ¨æœªæœ‰ Class æ™‚ï¼Œä»ç„¶æ˜¯éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ call å°‡ this æŒ‡å®šçµ¦çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥ Prototype çš„ Method åšåŸ·è¡Œï¼š

function Person(name) {
  this.name = name;
}

Person.prototype.sayHello = function () {

};

function Employee(name) {
  Person.call(this, name);
}

Employee.prototype = Object.create(Person.prototype);

// é€²è¡Œ Super call

å„˜ç®¡æˆ‘å·²ç¶“å°‡ä¾‹å­ç›¡é‡ç°¡åŒ–äº†ï¼Œçœ‹èµ·ä¾†é‚„æ˜¯å¾ˆéº»ç…©ï¼Œä¸” Person è¦è¢« Super Call çš„ Method ä¹Ÿå¾—å¦å¤–è¨­ç½®åœ¨ Prototype ä¸­ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯åˆ° Class æ™‚ä»£å¾Œä¸€åˆ‡ä¾¿ä¸åŒäº†ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆå°±åœ¨é‹ç”¨ä¸Šæ–¹æåˆ°çš„ super ï¼Œæ—¢ç„¶æ˜¯é€éå‚³é€åƒæ•¸çµ¦å®ƒä¾†å‰µå»º Properties ï¼Œé‚£ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€é super ç›´æ¥å‘¼å«çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥ä¸­çš„Method ï¼š

class Person {
  constructor(name) {
    this.name = name;
  }

  getFrom() {
    const state = 'Taiwan';
    return `${this.name} from ${state}.`;
  }
}

class Employee extends Person {
  constructor(name, position) {
    super(name);
    this.position = position;
  }

  getPosition() {
    return `${this.name}'s position is the ${this.position}.`;
  }
  
  // super call
  superCallGetForm() {

  }
}

const luck = new Employee('Luck', 'Front-end');

console.log(luck.superCallGetForm()); // Luck from Taiwan.

æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ç°¡æ½”å¤šäº†ï¼Ÿé€é super ä¾¿ä¸éœ€è¦å†æ‰‹å‹•è™•ç† Prototype ã€‚

é‚£ä¾ç…§æ…£ä¾‹ï¼Œåœ¨ Inheritance é€™å€‹æ®µè½çš„çµå°¾ä¹Ÿä¾†é©—è­‰ Class é–“çš„ Inheritance æ˜¯å¦ä¹ŸåŒæ¨£æ˜¯åœ¨æ“ä½œ Constructor çš„ Prototype ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯çš„è©±ï¼Œé‚£å­é¡åˆ¥ Employee çš„ Prototype æ‡‰è©²æœƒç­‰æ–¼çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥ Person ï¼Œè€Œ Instance çš„ Prototype ä¾ç„¶æŒ‡å‘ Employee ï¼š

由 luck 繼承自 Employee ， Employee 又繼承自 Person ，這稱為 Prototype chain （原型鏈）

åˆ°é€™è£¡æ‡‰è©²å¯ä»¥æ¸…æ¥šæ˜ç™½ï¼Œ

å°±ç®—çœ¼ç›çœ‹è¦‹çš„æ˜¯ Class ï¼Œå¯«ä¸‹çš„ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ Class ï¼Œä½†éª¨å­è£¡æ“ä½œçš„å»é‚„æ˜¯ Prototype ã€‚

å­¸æœƒåœ¨ Class ä¸­å‰µå»º Instance ã€ Inheritance ã€ Super Call å¾Œï¼Œæ¥è‘—ä¾†çœ‹çœ‹ Class æä¾›çš„ Static Method ï¼ˆéœæ…‹æ–¹æ³•ï¼‰ï¼

Static

åœ¨ Class å…§çš„ Method å¯ä»¥åŠ ä¸Š static å‰ç¶´ï¼Œä½¿å®ƒè®Šæˆ Static Method ï¼ˆéœæ…‹æ–¹æ³•ï¼‰ï¼Œè¢«å®šç¾©ç‚º Static Method å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä»¥ Constructor å‘¼å«ï¼Œä½†å‰µå»ºå‡ºä¾†çš„ Instance æ˜¯ç„¡æ³•ä½¿ç”¨å®ƒçš„ï¼š

class Person {
  constructor(name) {
    this.name = name;
  }

  static sayHello(name) {
    return `Hi!${name}!`;
  }

  getFrom() {
    const state = 'Taiwan';
    return `${this.name} from ${state}.`;
  }
}

console.log(Person.sayHello('Luck')); // Hi!Luck!

Getter & Setter

å‰ç¶´è©å…¶å¯¦ä¸åªæœ‰ static ï¼Œé€£å­˜å–å™¨çš„ get åŠ set ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åœ¨ Class ä¸­ä½œå®šç¾©ï¼š

class Person {
  constructor(name) {
    this.name = name;
  }

  static sayHello(name) {
    return `Hi!${name}!`;
  }

  get age() {
    if (this._age !== undefined) {
      return `${this.name} age is ${this._age}.`;
    }
    return `Don't know ${this.name}'s age.`;
  }

  set age(age) {
    this._age = age;
  }

  getFrom() {
    const state = 'Taiwan';
    return `${this.name} from ${state}.`;
  }
}

const john = new Person('John');

console.log(john.age); // Don't know John's age.
john.age = 18;
console.log(john.age); // John age is 18.

ç¶“å¸¸ç”¨æ–¼ä¸æƒ³ Instance ç›´æ¥å­˜å–çš„ç‹€æ³ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨ Getter å’Œ Setter ä¾†å‡è£æ“ä½œ Properties ï¼Œåœ¨è¨­å®šåŠå–å€¼æ™‚éƒ½å…ˆç¶“éä¸€äº›é‚è¼¯åˆ¤æ–·å†æ±ºå®šæ€éº¼è™•ç†ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸Šæ˜¯å°æ–¼ Class çš„ä¸€äº›æ•´ç†ï¼Œä¸ŠåŠéƒ¨ä¸»è¦æ˜¯åœ¨æ¯”è¼ƒ Class å‡ºç¾å‰å¾Œå° Constructor åŠ Inheritance çš„æ“ä½œæœ‰ä»€éº¼å·®åˆ¥ï¼Œçµå°¾è¬›è§£äº† Static å’Œ å­˜å–å™¨åœ¨ Class ä¸­çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ã€‚

item.content:encoded:
å‰è¨€

åŸè«’æˆ‘ç”¨é†œå­—åšé–‹ç‰ˆåœ–ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆè®“ç­†è€…å…ˆæ­å–œä¸€ä¸‹è‡ªå·±å¾æ•™å¬åœ°ç„ä¸­è„«é›¢ï¼Œè·é›¢ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡æ‰ç¶“éäº†ä¸€å¹´åŠï¼Œåœ¨å·¥ä½œæ‰å‰›æ›çš„æ™‚å€™ï¼Œé€™é€šçŸ¥å¯¦åœ¨æ˜¯ä¾†çš„æœ‰é»å¿«å’Œç„¡å¥ˆï¼Œä¸éé€™æ¬¡åœ¨å‡ºç™¼å‰éš¨æ‰‹å°‡ã€Œ Speaking JavaScript ã€æ”¾é€²è¡Œæï¼Œæƒ³èªªé‡æ–°è®€ä¸€é JavaScript ä¸­çš„ Object çŸ¥è­˜ï¼Œåšä¸‹ç­†è¨˜ï¼Œæ‰è®“é€™ä¸ƒå¤©çš„ç²¾å¯¦ï¼ˆç„¡èŠï¼‰ç”Ÿæ´»æ²’é‚£éº¼ç„¡è¶£ã€‚

Object

æœ¬ç¯‡æ–‡ç« çš„å…§å®¹éƒ½æ˜¯å¾ã€Œ Speak JavaScript ã€æ›¸ä¸­æ•´ç†ï¼Œæœƒåˆ†æˆå¹¾å€‹éƒ¨åˆ†è¬›è§£ï¼š

  1. Object ï¼ˆç‰©ä»¶ï¼‰

  4. Prototypal inheritance ï¼ˆåŸå‹ç¹¼æ‰¿ï¼‰
  5. Constructor ï¼ˆå»ºæ§‹å™¨ï¼‰
  6. Constructor inheritance ï¼ˆå»ºæ§‹å™¨é–“çš„ç¹¼æ‰¿ï¼‰

é‚£ä»¥ä¸Šå¦‚æœé‚„æœ‰æ¨è–¦å¤šèªªæ˜çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œæ­¡è¿å†ç•™è¨€å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘ï¼

Object ç‰©ä»¶

åœ¨ JavaScript ä¸­å®£å‘Šä¸€å€‹ Object ï¼ˆç‰©ä»¶ï¼‰æ™‚ä½¿ç”¨é¦–å°¾å¤§æ‹¬è™Ÿå»ºç«‹ç¯„åœï¼Œ Object å…§çš„ Property ï¼ˆç‰¹æ€§ï¼‰ç‚ºä¸€å€‹ key ï¼ˆéµï¼‰æ­é…ä¸€å€‹ value ï¼ˆå€¼ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸¦ä»¥é€—è™Ÿå€éš”æ¯å€‹ Propertyï¼š

//å®£å‘Šä¸€å€‹ Object ç‰©ä»¶ï¼Œæ­é…é¦–å°¾å¤§æ‹¬è™Ÿ
let mary = {
    //æ¯å€‹ Property é–“ä½¿ç”¨é€—è™Ÿå€éš”
    name: 'Mary',
    sayHello: function(){
        console.log(`Hello ${this.name}`)

Property çš„ value å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä»»ä½•çš„å‹æ…‹å€¼ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ string ã€ integer ã€ function åˆæˆ–æ˜¯å¦ä¸€å€‹ Object ï¼Œæ­¤å¤–ï¼Œ Object æ”¯æ´äº†åœ¨æœ€å¾Œä¸€å€‹ Property å¾ŒåŠ ä¸Šé€—è™Ÿï¼Œå³ä½¿å®ƒæ˜¯æœ€å¾Œï¼Œé€™å€‹å¯«æ³•å¯ä»¥è®“ä¹‹å¾Œè¦èª¿æ•´ Property çš„æ™‚å€™æ¯”è¼ƒä¸æœƒå‡ºç¾éŒ¯èª¤ï¼Œå› ç‚ºä¸å¿…åœ¨æ„èª°è¦æ“ºåœ¨æœ€å¾Œã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨ Object ä¸­çš„ Property æ–¹å¼æœ‰å…©ç¨®ï¼š

  1. . é»è™Ÿé‹ç®—å­ï¼Œåªè¦åœ¨ Object åç¨±å¾Œä½¿ç”¨ . ä¸¦æŒ‡å®š Property çš„ key ï¼Œå³å¯è®€å–è©²ç‰¹æ€§çš„å€¼ã€‚
  2. [] ä¸­æ‹¬è™Ÿï¼Œåœ¨ä¸­æ‹¬è™Ÿè£¡å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹è¿°å¥ï¼Œæœƒç¶“ç”±é‹ç®—ï¼Œä¸¦å°‡å€¼è½‰ç‚ºå­—ä¸²å¾Œå°‹æ‰¾å°æ‡‰çš„ key å€¼ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹ç‚ºå…©ç¨®æ–¹å¼çš„ä½¿ç”¨ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

//ä½¿ç”¨ . é»è™Ÿé‹ç®—å­
console.log(mary.name)  
//å°å‡º Mary

//ä½¿ç”¨ [] ä¸­åˆ®è™Ÿé‹ç®—å­
const propertyNameA = 'say'
const propertyNameB = 'Hello'
mary[propertyNameA + propertyNameB]()

const copyObj = originObj => {

    const originPrototype = Object.getPrototypeOf(originObj)

    return newObj

Constructor ï¼ˆå»ºæ§‹å™¨ï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹ Function ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨å®ƒä¾†å»ºç«‹ä¸€äº›ç›¸ä¼¼çš„ Object ï¼Œè¢« Constructor å»ºç«‹å‡ºä¾†çš„ Object è¢«ç¨±ç‚ºå®ƒçš„ Instance ï¼ˆå¯¦é«”ï¼‰ï¼Œ Constructor åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ™‚èˆ‡ä¸€èˆ¬ Function ä¸åŒï¼Œæ˜¯è—‰ç”± new ä¾†å‘¼å«ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯èªªï¼Œå®ƒåªæœ‰å†è—‰ç”± new çš„ç‹€æ…‹ä¸‹ä½¿ç”¨æ‰æœƒæ˜¯ Constructor ã€‚

ä¸‹æ–¹å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹ Person ä½œç‚º Constructor ï¼Œä¸¦åˆ©ç”¨å®ƒå»ºç«‹ mary åŠ kitty ç‰©ä»¶ï¼š

// Constructor ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹å­—æ¯é€šå¸¸å¤§å¯«
function Person(name){

    this.name = name

const mary = new Person('Mary')

//æ¯å€‹ Instance çš„ constructor å±¬æ€§éƒ½æœƒæŒ‡å‘ Constructor æœ¬èº«
kitty.constructor === Person

åœ¨ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥èªª mary å’Œ kitty æ˜¯ Person çš„ Instance ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç™¼ç¾ Constructor èƒ½å”åŠ©å»ºç«‹æ“æœ‰åŸºæœ¬è³‡æ–™çš„ Object ï¼Œè€Œè¦è™•ç†é€™äº› Object çš„ Function ä¾¿èƒ½æ”¾åœ¨ Prototype ä¸­ï¼Œä»¥é”æˆè³‡æ–™åœ¨ Constructor çš„ Instance ï¼Œ æ–¹æ³•åœ¨ Prototype çš„é—œæ³¨é»åˆ†é›¢åŸå‰‡ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯è—‰ç”± Constructor å»ºç«‹çš„ Object å°±ä¸æœƒå†ç¶“é Object.create ï¼Œè©²å¦‚ä½•å°é‚£äº› Instance è¨­å®š Prototype å‘¢ï¼Ÿç­”æ¡ˆåœ¨ Constructor ä¸­ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€å€‹ Constructor éƒ½æ“æœ‰ Prototype çš„å±¬æ€§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŠŠæ–¹æ³•è¨­å®šåœ¨ Prototype ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†ï¼Œåªè¦æ˜¯é€éè©² Constructor å»ºç«‹çš„ Instance ï¼Œä¹Ÿéƒ½æœƒæ“æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„ Prototype ï¼š

// Constructor
function Person(name){

}

//è¨­å®š Prototype
Person.prototype.sayHello = function(){

é—œæ–¼ Constructor çš„ Prototype ä¹Ÿæœƒæœ‰ä¸€å€‹å±¬æ€§ç‚º constructor ï¼Œæ­£å¸¸ä¾†èªªè©²å±¬æ€§çš„å€¼æœƒæŒ‡å‘ Constructor è‡ªèº«ï¼Œé›–ç„¶åœ¨è¨­è¨ˆæ™‚ï¼Œä¸æœƒæœ‰éå¾—ä½¿ç”¨è©²å±¬æ€§çš„æƒ…æ³ï¼Œä½†å°‡å®ƒç¶­æŒåŸæœ‰çš„æ¨£å­æ˜¯å€‹å¥½ç¿’æ…£ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ä¾‹å­ä¸­æ‰æ²’æœ‰ç›´æ¥è¦†è“‹ Prototype ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æ“´å……çš„æ–¹å¼å°‡ sayHello å®šç¾©åˆ° Prototype ä¸­ï¼Œç•¶ç„¶å¦‚æœè¦ç›´æ¥è¦†è“‹ Prototype ï¼Œä¹Ÿåªéœ€æŠŠ constructor çš„å€¼æŒ‡å‘ Constructor å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼š

Constructor é–“çš„ç¹¼æ‰¿æœ‰é»é¡ä¼¼ã€Œçˆ¶é¡åˆ¥ã€åŠã€Œå­é¡åˆ¥ã€çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œé€™è£¡è¦æ€è€ƒçš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€å€‹ Constructor çš„æ™‚å€™å»å‘¼å«å¦ä¸€å€‹ Constructor å»ºç«‹ Property ï¼Œè½èµ·ä¾†å¾ˆè¤‡é›œï¼Œä½†ç°¡å–®ä¾†èªªï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨ call åœ¨ Constructor å»ºç«‹ç‰©ä»¶æ™‚å°‡ this æŒ‡å®šçµ¦å¦ä¸€å€‹ Constructor è¨­å®š Property ï¼Œå¯¦ä½œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

è² è²¬è³‡æ–™é¢çš„ Property æœƒæ¯”è¼ƒå¥½è™•ç†ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ–¹æ³•é¡çš„ Prototype è©²æ€éº¼åšå‘¢ï¼Ÿå…¶å¯¦å°±å’Œ Object çš„ç¹¼æ‰¿ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œä»¥çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥çš„ Prototype ç‚ºåŸå‹æŒ‡å®šçµ¦å­é¡åˆ¥çš„ Prototype å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œä½†éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå› ç‚ºç›´æ¥æŒ‡å®šçˆ¶é¡åˆ¥ Prototype çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦é‡æ–°æŠŠå­é¡åˆ¥çš„ constructor å±¬æ€§å€¼æŒ‡å®šçµ¦è‡ªå·±ï¼š

function Person(name){
    this.name = name
}

Person.prototype.sayHello = function(){
    console.log(`Hello ${this.name}`)
}

function Employee(name,dept){
    Person.call(this,name)
    this.dept = dept
}

Employee.prototype = Object.create(Person.prototype)
//å°‡ prototype çš„ constructor å±¬æ€§æŒ‡å›è‡ªèº«
Employee.prototype.constructor = Employee

const mary = new Employee('Mary','IT')
const kitty = new Employee('Kitty','HR')

//ç¹¼æ‰¿è‡ª Person.prototype çš„ function
mary.sayHello()
// Hello Mary

æœ€å¾Œä¾†äº†è§£ä¸€ä¸‹ Super call ï¼ˆè¶…å‘¼å«ï¼‰ï¼Œå®ƒçš„æ„æ€æ˜¯åœ¨å­é¡åˆ¥çš„ Function ä¸­ï¼Œå»å‘¼å«çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥çš„ Function ï¼š

function Person(name){
    this.name = name
}

Person.prototype.sayHello = function(){

}

function Employee(name,dept){
    Person.call(this,name)
    this.dept = dept
}

Employee.prototype = Object.create(Person.prototype)
Employee.prototype.constructor = Employee
Employee.prototype.selfIntroduction = function(){
    //åœ¨å‘¼å«æ™‚è¦æŒ‡å®š this ï¼Œå› ç‚ºä»–çš„åŸ·è¡Œç’°å¢ƒ Person.prototype ä¸­æ²’æœ‰ name Property
    Person.prototype.sayHello.call(this)

}

const mary = new Employee('Mary','IT')

marry.selfIntroduction()
//æœƒåŒæ™‚åˆ—å‡º
/*
Hello Mary
In the IT department
*/

ä½†å¾ Property åˆ° Prototype ç‚ºæ­¢çš„è™•ç†ï¼Œåœ¨ Employee ä¸­éƒ½æ˜¯æŠŠ Person çµ¦å¯«æ­»ï¼Œåœ¨å¯¦å‹™ä¸Šå¯ä»¥å°‡ Person å­˜åœ¨ Employee çš„ Property ä¸­ï¼Œç¶­æŒæ›´æœ‰å½ˆæ€§çš„å¯«æ³•ï¼š

function Person(name){
    this.name = name
}

Person.prototype.sayHello = function(){
    console.log(`Hello ${this.name}`)
}

function Employee(name,dept){
    // construcotr çš„ prototype çš„ constructor æœƒæŒ‡æœƒè‡ªå·±
    Employee._super.constructor.call(this,name)
    this.dept = dept
}

Employee.prototype.selfIntroduction = function(){
    //æ”¹æˆå¾ Property ä¸­å»è®€
    Employee._super.sayHello.call(this)
    console.log(`In the ${this.dept} department`)
}

const subclass = (subC,superC) => {
    //è™•ç†prototype
    let subProto = Object.create(superC.prototype)
    //å°‡åŸæœ¬ subC.prototype çš„ Property å®šç¾©çµ¦ subProto (é€™è£¡å’Œè¤‡è£½ç‰©ä»¶æ™‚ç”¨çš„æ–¹å¼ç›¸åŒ)
    const arrOwnProperties = Object.getOwnPropertyNames(subC.prototype)
    arrOwnProperties.forEach( property => {
        const prototypeDesc = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(subC.prototype,property)
        Object.defineProperty(subProto,property,prototypeDesc)
    })
    //å°‡è™•ç†å®Œå¾Œçš„ prototype çµ¦ subC çš„ protoype
    subC.prototype = subProto
    //å®šç¾© _super Property ç‚ºçˆ¶é¡åˆ¥çš„ prototype
    subC._super = superC.prototype
}

//è¨­å®š Person å’Œ Employee ç‚ºçˆ¶å­é¡åˆ¥
subclass(Employee,Person)

const mary = new Employee('Mary','IT')

mary.selfIntroduction()
//æœƒåŒæ™‚åˆ—å‡º
/*
Hello Mary
In the IT department
*/

subclass å…§åšçš„äº‹æƒ…å’Œè¤‡è£½ç‰©ä»¶æœ‰é»åƒï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯åœ¨è™•ç† Prototype åŠ Property ï¼Œå…¶å¯¦åœ¨ JavaScript ä¸­ï¼Œé—œæ–¼ç‰©ä»¶çš„ä½¿ç”¨åŠç¹¼æ‰¿ï¼Œä¹Ÿåªéœ€ææ‡‚é€™å…©å€‹å±¬æ€§å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼å¦‚ä¸Šæ–¹ï¼Œé€šé subclass ä¾¿èƒ½å°‡çˆ¶å­é¡åˆ¥éƒ½è¨­å®šå¥½ï¼Œé€éå°‡çˆ¶é¡åˆ¥çš„ Prototype å­˜åœ¨å­é¡åˆ¥çš„ Property è£¡ï¼Œåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šä¹Ÿå°±æ›´æœ‰å½ˆæ€§åŠç°¡å–®ã€‚

å‰è¨€

Hi ï¼å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œé›–ç„¶ä¹‹å‰æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨ Enzyme è¬›è§£å¦‚ä½•æ­é… Jest å° React çš„Component åšæ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¹¾å€‹ç¦®æ‹œå‰å¶ç„¶åœ¨æŸå€‹è¨è«–ä¸²ä¸­çœ‹åˆ°æœ‰å¤§ç¥æ¨è–¦å¦ä¸€å¥—æ¸¬è©¦ Component çš„å¥—ä»¶ react-testing-library ï¼ŒåŠŸèƒ½å’Œ Enzyme ç›¸åŒï¼Œå…©è€…éƒ½æ˜¯åœ¨æ¸¬è©¦æ™‚ Render Component çš„ DOM ä¸‹æ–·è¨€æ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯å‰›æ¥è§¸ Enzyme çš„æœ‹å‹ï¼Œä¸å¦¨å¯ä»¥åƒè€ƒçœ‹çœ‹å…©è€…çš„ä¸åŒï¼Œä¾†é¸æ“‡æ„›ç”¨å¥—ä»¶ ğŸ˜ƒ ã€‚

åœ¨é–‹å§‹æ¸¬è©¦ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œä»ç„¶éœ€è¦ä¸€å€‹å°åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œé€™è£¡è«‹å‡ºä¹‹å‰å¸¸éœ²é¢çš„ Counter ä¾†æ“”ä»» SUTï¼š

import React, { useState } from 'react';

const Counter = () => {

    <div>
      <span data-testid="display_count">{`é»äº†${count}ä¸‹`}</span>

export default Counter;

å®‰è£ react-testing-library

å¸¸ç”¨ API

æ’°å¯«æ¸¬è©¦å‰ï¼Œå…ˆç°¡å–®èªªæ˜å¹¾å€‹å¸¸ç”¨çš„ API ï¼š

å…¶å¯¦åªè¦äº†è§£ä¸Šè¿°å¹¾å€‹ç°¡å–®çš„ API ï¼Œå°±èƒ½å¤ è¼•é¬†å° Component çš„ç¯€é»åšæ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œä¸‹æ–¹å…ˆ render å‡º Counter ï¼Œä¸¦å° span çš„å…§å®¹åšæ–·è¨€ï¼Œç¢ºèªæ˜¯å¦ render æ­£ç¢ºï¼š

import React from 'react';
import { render, fireEvent, cleanup } from 'react-testing-library';

ä¸Šæ–¹ç”¨äº†ä¸‰ç¨®æ–¹å¼å»å–å¾— span ä¾†ç¢ºèª Component é¡¯ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¢ºï¼Œ getByTestId å°±æ˜¯ç›´æ¥æŠ“å–ç›¸åŒ data-testid çš„ DOMï¼Œç„¶å¾Œå¦‚æœä¸å¹¸æœ‰å…©å€‹ DOM åŒæ™‚ç”¨äº†ä¸€æ¨£çš„ data-testid é‚£æ¸¬è©¦å°±æœƒç™¼ç”ŸéŒ¯èª¤ï¼š

顯示找到複數的錯誤

ä½†éŒ¯èª¤çš„æç¤ºé‚„æ»¿ä¸éŒ¯çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœçœŸçš„å¿…é ˆè¦å–åŒæ¨£çš„åç¨±ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç”¨ getAllByTestId ï¼Œä¾†ç²å¾—ä¸€å€‹é™£åˆ—ï¼Œç•¶ç„¶å®ƒä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç”± render å›å‚³çš„ Method ä¹‹ä¸€ã€‚

import React from 'react';
import { connect } from 'react-redux';
import PropTypes from 'prop-types';
import { addCounter } from '../../actions/Counter';

export const Counter = (props) => {
  const { count, addCount, } = props;
  return (
    <div>
      <span data-testid="display_count">{`é»äº†${count}ä¸‹`}</span>
      <br />
      <button className="add_button" type="button" onClick={() => { addCount(1); }}>é»æˆ‘åŠ  1</button>
      <button className="add_button" type="button" onClick={() => { addCount(2); }}>é»æˆ‘åŠ  2</button>
    </div>
  );
};

Counter.propTypes = {
  count: PropTypes.number,
  addCount: PropTypes.func,
};

Counter.defaultProps = {
  count: 0,
  addCount: () => { console.log('error'); },
};

const mapStateToProps = state => ({
  count: state.count,
});

const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({
  addCount: addQuantity => dispatch(addCounter(addQuantity)),
});

export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Counter);

é›–ç„¶åœ¨ JavaScript ä¸­ï¼Œè™•ç†åŒæ­¥å•é¡Œä¸€ç›´ä¸æ˜¯è¼•é¬†çš„äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ Jest åœ¨åŸ·è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦çš„æ™‚å€™å¯ä»¥é€é done() ä¾†æ‡‰ä»˜é€™å€‹ç‹€æ³ã€‚

ç°¡å–®ä¾†èªªï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨æ¸¬è©¦è£¡æœ‰åŠ å…¥ done() ï¼Œé‚£åªè¦é‚„æ²’åŸ·è¡Œåˆ° done() å°±ä¸ç®—çµæŸæ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥å°‡å®ƒåŠ å…¥ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ç¨‹å¼è£¡ï¼š

let async = require('../funcs/async.js')

//å°‡ done å‚³å…¥æ¸¬è©¦ä¸­
test('test async', (done) => {
    const callBack = (data) => {
        expect(data).toBe('getData')

        //åœ¨ callBack å‡½å¼å…§çš„æ–·è¨€å¾ŒåŠ ä¸Š done
        done()
    }
    async.fetchData(callBack)
})

åŠ å…¥ done() å¾Œé‡æ–°åŸ·è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°å ±å‘Šå‘ˆç¾äº†å®Œç¾çš„ä¸€ç‰‡ç¶ å…‰ã€‚

測試覆蓋率已達 100 %

éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ¸¬è©¦ä¸­æœ‰å‚³å…¥ done ä½†å»æœªåŸ·è¡Œå®ƒï¼Œé‚£éº¼è©²æ¸¬è©¦çµæœå°±æœƒå‡ºç¾ FAIL å¤±æ•—ï¼š

    const callBack = (data) => {

    async.fetchData(callBack)

åŸ·è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦çµæœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

測試時擁有參數 done 卻未執行，測試會產生錯誤

ä½¿ç”¨ Promise

å¦‚æœæ—¢æœ‰çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å·²ä½¿ç”¨ Promise è™•ç†åŒæ­¥ï¼Œä¾¿ä¸å¿…å†ä½¿ç”¨ done ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä»¥ .then æ¥æ”¶ Promise ç‰©ä»¶å‚³é€² resolve çš„çµæœå³å¯ï¼š

const promiseFetchData = () =>{
    return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{
        setTimeout(()=>{
            resolve('getData')
        }, 3000)
    }) 
}

module.exports = {
    promiseFetchData: promiseFetchData
}
let async = require('../funcs/async.js')

test('test promise async', ()=>{
    //return æ˜¯å¿…é ˆçš„ï¼Œå¦å‰‡ä¸æœƒåŸ·è¡Œ .then çš„å…§å®¹
    return async.promiseFetchData()
        .then((data)=>{
            expect(data).toBe('getData')
        })
})

éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œåœ¨æ¸¬è©¦çš„ function ä¸­å¿…é ˆåŠ ä¸Š return ï¼Œå¦å‰‡æ¸¬è©¦ä¸æœƒè·‘é€² .then ä¸­ï¼Œåªæœƒåœ¨ Promise å°‡çµæœé€é€² resolve æ™‚å°±çµæŸäº†ï¼Œå¦å¤–ï¼ç•¶ Promise ä¸­çš„çµæœè·‘é€² reject é‚£æ¸¬è©¦ä¹Ÿæœƒç”¢ç”ŸéŒ¯èª¤ã€‚

æ¸¬è©¦çµæœå¾—åˆ° PASS ï¼Œè¦†è“‹ç‡ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ 100 %ï¼š

使用 Promise 測試的結果

ä¸Šè¿°èªªæ˜äº†æˆåŠŸçš„ resolve åœ¨æ¸¬è©¦ä¸­ç”¨ .then æ¥æ”¶ï¼Œè€Œå¤±æ•—çš„ reject å‰‡æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ .catch è™•ç†æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†çš„å‹•ä½œï¼Œé€™éƒ¨åˆ†å’Œ Promise çš„æ“ä½œéƒ½ç›¸åŒï¼Œå°±ä¸å†é—¡è¿°ï¼Œå¦‚æœå° Promise ä¸ç†Ÿï¼Œå¯ä»¥åƒè€ƒã€ŒJacaScript | å¾Promiseé–‹å§‹æ‰¿è«¾çš„éƒ¨è½æ ¼ç”Ÿæ´»ã€ã€‚

Jest åœ¨ expect å…§é‚„å¦å¤–æ“æœ‰å…©å€‹å…§å»ºå±¬æ€§ä¾†é‡å° Promise åšè™•ç†ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ¥ç‚º resolves åŠ rejects ï¼Œä»–å€‘æœƒç›´æ¥æ•æ‰ Promise å‚³é€²resolve æˆ– reject çš„è³‡æ–™åˆ¤æ–·æ˜¯å¦ç¬¦åˆæœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œé€™è£¡ä»¥ rejects ä½œç‚ºä¾‹å­ï¼š

const promiseErrorFetchData = () =>{
    return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{
        setTimeout(()=>{
            reject('error')

    }) 
}

module.exports = {
    promiseErrorFetchData: promiseErrorFetchData

æ¸¬è©¦æ™‚ï¼Œç›´æ¥å°‡ promiseErrorFetchData ä½œç‚ºåƒæ•¸å‚³éçµ¦ expect ï¼Œä¸¦é€é expect çš„å…§å»ºå±¬æ€§ rejects å–å¾— promiseErrorFetchData ä¸­ Promise å‚³é€² reject çš„è³‡æ–™ä¸‹æ–·è¨€ï¼š

test('test rejects in promise',()=>{
    //return æ˜¯å¿…é ˆçš„ï¼Œå¦å‰‡ä¸æœƒç­‰ Promise åŸ·è¡Œåˆ° reject æ¸¬è©¦å°±çµæŸäº†
    return expect(async.promiseErrorFetchData()).rejects.toBe('error')

é€™å€‹æ–¹å¼ç­†è€…èªç‚ºèƒ½å¤ æ›´ç›´è¦ºæ€§çš„ä½¿ç”¨ Promise çš„æ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°çš„çµæœä¹Ÿéƒ½å’Œä¸Šæ–¹ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œä½†ä¸»è¦é‚„æ˜¯é…åˆåœ˜éšŠä½¿ç”¨å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ç¨®ï¼Œæ‰ä¸æœƒè®“æ¸¬è©¦ä»£ç¢¼é¡¯å¾—é›œäº‚ï¼Œç•¶ç„¶ï¼å€‹äººé–‹ç™¼ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€æ¨£ã€‚

æœ¬æ–‡é‡å°ç•°æ­¥è«‹æ±‚åœ¨æ¸¬è©¦å…§ç”¢ç”Ÿçš„å•é¡Œèˆ‰äº†å¹¾å€‹ä¾‹å­è§£æ±ºï¼Œä½†å…¶å¯¦å®˜ç¶²ä¸Šé‚„æœ‰æå‡ºä¸€ç¨®ä½¿ç”¨ async/await çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œä¸éç­†è€…é‚„æœªå­¸ç¿’åˆ° JavaScript ä¸­é—œæ–¼ async åŠ await çš„ç”¨æ³•ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ€•ç¾éšæ®µæœƒèª¤å°å¤§å®¶ï¼Œå°±ç­‰æ—¥å¾Œä½¿ç”¨åˆ°å†å›ä¾†è£œå……æ–‡ç« å…§å®¹ã€‚

å¦‚æœæ–‡ç« ä¸­æœ‰ä»»ä½•å•é¡Œï¼Œæˆ–æ˜¯ä¸ç†è§£çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œéƒ½å¯ä»¥ç•™è¨€å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘ï¼è¬è¬å¤§å®¶ï¼

åƒè€ƒæ–‡ç«

item.title: Jest | æ›¿æ¸¬è©¦è¨­ç½®åˆ†é¡ï¼ˆdescribeï¼‰åŠä½œç”¨åŸŸï¼ˆscopingï¼‰
item.description: å‰è¨€ é—œæ–¼ describe ï¼Œåœ¨é€²è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦æ™‚å…¶å¯¦æ˜¯å¾ˆåŸºæœ¬çš„åˆ†é¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å› ç‚º describe ç‰½æ‰¯åˆ°äº†ä½œç”¨åŸŸï¼Œè€Œåœ¨ä½œç”¨åŸŸå…§çš„ beforeAll å’Œ afterAll ç­‰ Function åˆå’Œ async ç•°æ­¥æ¸¬è©¦æœ‰é—œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ¬ç¯‡æ–‡ç« çš„å…§å®¹å¯èƒ½æœƒéœ€è¦å…ˆäº†è§£ã€ŒUnit Testâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
å‰è¨€

é—œæ–¼ describe ï¼Œåœ¨é€²è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦æ™‚å…¶å¯¦æ˜¯å¾ˆåŸºæœ¬çš„åˆ†é¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å› ç‚º describe ç‰½æ‰¯åˆ°äº†ä½œç”¨åŸŸï¼Œè€Œåœ¨ä½œç”¨åŸŸå…§çš„ beforeAll å’Œ afterAll ç­‰ Function åˆå’Œ async ç•°æ­¥æ¸¬è©¦æœ‰é—œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ¬ç¯‡æ–‡ç« çš„å…§å®¹å¯èƒ½æœƒéœ€è¦å…ˆäº†è§£ã€ŒUnit Test | è·¨è¶ŠåŒæ­¥åŸ·è¡Œçš„ Jest æ¸¬è©¦ã€è£¡æ‰€æåˆ°çš„å¹¾å€‹ç”¨æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰ä»»ä½•å•é¡Œå†éº»ç…©ç•™è¨€å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘ï¼Œè¬è¬ï¼

describe

åœ¨è¬›è§£ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å…ˆçœ‹ä¸€äº›åŸºæœ¬çš„æ¸¬è©¦ï¼š

const sum = (x = 0, y = 0) => {
    return (isNaN(x) ? 0 : x) + (isNaN(y) ? 0 : y)
}

const square = (x = 0) => {
    let intX = isNaN(x) ? 0 : x
    return intX * intX
}

test('Test default return zero', () => {
    expect(sum()).toBe(0)
})

test('Test 3 plus 5 is 8', () => {
    expect(sum(3, 5)).toBe(8)
})

test('Pass when value is NaN can return zero', () => {
    expect(sum(NaN, NaN)).not.toBeNaN()
})

test('Pass 3 can return 9', () => {
    expect(square(3)).toBe(9)
})

test('Pass when value is String can return zero', () => {
    expect(square('efg')).toBe(0)
})

ä¸Šæ–¹å° sum åšäº†ä¸‰æ¬¡æ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œ square åšäº†ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œé€šéæ¸¬è©¦å¾Œå¾—åˆ°äº† PASS çš„çµæœï¼š

所有測試內容混在一起，不容易看出是在測試什麼 Function

æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ¸¬è©¦å…§å®¹éƒ½æœƒæ¢åˆ—é¡¯ç¤ºï¼Œé›–ç„¶å¯ä»¥æ¸…æ¥šçš„çŸ¥é“åœ¨æ¯ä¸€é …æ¸¬è©¦ä¸­åšäº†ä»€éº¼äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œä½†å»ç„¡æ³•æ›‰å¾—è©²æ¸¬è©¦æ˜¯å°å“ªå€‹ Function åšçš„ï¼Œè€Œå°±ä¸€èˆ¬ä¾†èªªï¼Œæ¸¬è©¦æª”æ¡ˆè£¡ä¹Ÿä¸æœƒåªéœ€æ¸¬è©¦ä¸€å€‹ Function è€Œå·²ã€‚

å› æ­¤ï¼Œéœ€è¦æŠŠæ¸¬è©¦ç”¨ describe åˆ†é¡ï¼Œè®“æ¸¬è©¦è€…å¯ä»¥ä¸€çœ¼å°±èƒ½çŸ¥é“å“ªäº›æ¸¬è©¦å…§å®¹æ˜¯å°å“ªå€‹ Function ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

describe çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•å¾ˆç°¡å–®ï¼Œå°±åƒ test ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œå®ƒæœƒæ¥æ”¶å…©å€‹åƒæ•¸ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€å€‹æ˜¯å° describe çš„æè¿°ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒå€‹æ˜¯ Function ï¼Œå±¬æ–¼æ­¤ describe çš„ test éƒ½æ”¾åœ¨è©² Function ä¸­ã€‚

å°‡ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ä¾‹å­åšåˆ†é¡æœƒå¾—åˆ°ï¼š

/*å‡½å¼éƒ¨ä»½çœç•¥*/

describe('Test sum', () => {
    test('Test default return zero', () => {
        expect(sum()).toBe(0)
    })

    test('Test 3 plus 5 is 8', () => {
        expect(sum(3, 5)).toBe(8)
    })

    test('Pass when value is NaN can return zero', () => {
        expect(sum(NaN, NaN)).not.toBeNaN()
    })
})

describe('Test square', () => {
    test('Pass 3 can return 9', () => {
        expect(square(3)).toBe(9)
    })

    test('Pass when value is String can return zero', () => {
        expect(square('efg')).toBe(0)
    })
})

ç¶“éåˆ†é¡å¾Œå†é€²è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦ï¼Œæœƒæ›´æ¸…æ¥šæ¯ä¸€é …æ¸¬è©¦æ˜¯åœ¨å“ªå€‹ Function èº«ä¸Šï¼š

經過分類後會更清楚每一項測試是在哪個 Function 身上

scoping

æ¯å€‹ .test.js æ¸¬è©¦æª”æ¡ˆçš„å…§å®¹å°±å¦‚ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ JavaScript ï¼Œä¾ç…§ Function çš„ç¯„åœåˆ†æˆå…¨åŸŸåŠå€åŸŸçš„åŸ·è¡Œã€‚

åœ¨æ¸¬è©¦ä¸­ï¼ŒåŸ·è¡Œç¯„åœæœƒå½±éŸ¿åˆ°çš„é™¤äº†è®Šæ•¸å¤–é‚„æœ‰å¦å¤–å¹¾å€‹ Jest æä¾›çš„å‡½å¼ï¼š

  1. beforeAll ï¼šæ‰€åœ¨å€åŸŸå…§æœƒç¬¬ä¸€å€‹åŸ·è¡Œã€‚
  2. beforeEach ï¼šæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡çš„æ¸¬è©¦å‰æœƒå…ˆåŸ·è¡Œã€‚
  3. afterAll ï¼šæ‰€åœ¨å€åŸŸå…§æœ€å¾Œä¸€å€‹åŸ·è¡Œã€‚
  4. afterEach ï¼šæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡çš„æ¸¬è©¦å¾Œæœƒé¦¬ä¸ŠåŸ·è¡Œã€‚

å¯ç”±ä»¥ä¸‹ä¾‹å­æ›´æ¸…æ¥šå®ƒå€‘çš„åŸ·è¡Œé †åºï¼š

beforeAll(() => { console.log('å…¨åŸŸ beforeAll ï¼šå…¨åŸŸçš„ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹é †åºåŸ·è¡Œ') })
beforeEach(()=>{console.log('å…¨åŸŸ beforeEach ï¼šæ¯æ¬¡æ¸¬è©¦å‰éƒ½æœƒåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œå„ªå…ˆåº¦å¤§æ–¼å€åŸŸçš„')})
afterAll(() => { console.log('å…¨åŸŸ afterAll ï¼šå…¨åŸŸçš„æœ€å¾Œä¸€å€‹é †åºåŸ·è¡Œ') })
afterEach(()=>{console.log('å…¨åŸŸ afterEach ï¼šæ¯æ¬¡æ¸¬è©¦å¾Œéƒ½æœƒåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œå„ªå…ˆåº¦ä½æ–¼å€åŸŸçš„')})

describe('Test', () => {
    beforeAll(() => { console.log('å€åŸŸ beforeAll ï¼šå€åŸŸçš„ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹é †åºåŸ·è¡Œ') })
    beforeEach(()=>{console.log('å€åŸŸ beforeEach ï¼šæ¯æ¬¡æ¸¬è©¦å‰éƒ½æœƒåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œå„ªå…ˆåº¦ä½æ–¼å…¨åŸŸçš„')})
    afterAll(() => { console.log('å€åŸŸ afterAll ï¼šå€åŸŸçš„æœ€å¾Œä¸€å€‹é †åºåŸ·è¡Œ') })
    afterEach(()=>{console.log('å€åŸŸ afterEach ï¼šæ¯æ¬¡æ¸¬è©¦å¾Œéƒ½æœƒåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œå„ªå…ˆåº¦å¤§æ–¼å…¨åŸŸçš„')})

    test('Test1', () => {
        expect(true).toBe(true)
    })

    test('Test1', () => {
        expect(3).toBe(3)
    })
})

åŸ·è¡Œçµæœï¼š

beforeAll , afterAll , beforeEach , afterEach 在全域及區域內的執行順序

beforeAll å’Œ afterAll ä¸€å®šæ˜¯å…¨åŸŸå’Œå€åŸŸå…§çš„ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹åŸ·è¡Œï¼Œè€Œ beforeEach å’Œ afterEach å‰‡æœƒå¤¾ä½ test ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ¥æœƒåœ¨å–®ä¸€æ¸¬è©¦çš„å‰å¾ŒåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œåªè¦è¨˜ä½å…¨åŸŸçš„ before ä¸€å®šæ˜¯æœ€å…ˆï¼Œ after æ˜¯æœ€å¾Œã€‚

åœ¨æ¸¬è©¦è£¡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨ beforeAll æˆ– beforeEach åˆå»ºç«‹æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™ï¼Œä¸¦åœ¨æ¸¬è©¦å®Œå¾Œä»¥ afterAll æˆ– afterEach å°‡è³‡æ–™çµ¦ç§»é™¤ã€‚

æ¥è‘—é€éå¯¦éš›é‹ç”¨ä¾†ç†è§£é€™å››å€‹å‡½å¼çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

//æ¨¡æ“¬è³‡æ–™åº«çš„è³‡æ–™
const userDB = [
    { id: 1, name: 'å°æ˜' },
    { id: 2, name: 'å°è¯' },
]

//æ–°å¢æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™
const insertTestData = data => {
    userDB.push(data)
}

//ç§»é™¤æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™
const deleteTestData = id => {
    let findIndex = userDB.findIndex((user) => {
        return user.id === id
    })
    if (findIndex !== -1)
        userDB.splice(findIndex, 1)
}

//æŸ¥è©¢æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™
const getUserData = id => {
    let goalData = userDB.find((user) => {
        return user.id === id
    })
    return goalData
}

//å…¨éƒ¨æ¸¬è©¦å®Œå¾Œç¢ºèªè³‡æ–™ç‹€æ…‹
afterAll(() => {
    console.log(userDB)
})

describe('Test about user data', () => {

    //é–‹å§‹å‰æ–°å¢æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™
    beforeAll(() => {
        insertTestData({ id: 99, name: 'æ¸¬è©¦äººå“¡' })
    })
    //çµæŸæ™‚æ¸…é™¤æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™
    afterAll(() => {
        deleteTestData(99)
    })

    //ç¢ºèªæ˜¯å¦å›å‚³æ­£ç¢ºçš„è³‡æ–™
    test('Test get user data', () => {
        expect(getUserData(99)).toEqual({ id: 99, name: 'æ¸¬è©¦äººå“¡' })
    })

})

ä¸Šæ–¹ä¾‹å­ä½¿ç”¨ userDB æ¨¡æ“¬è³‡æ–™åº«çš„è³‡æ–™ï¼Œä¸¦åœ¨æ¸¬è©¦å‰é€é beforeAll æ–°å¢ä¸€ç­†æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™ï¼Œæ¸¬è©¦å®Œå¾Œå†ä»¥ afterAll å°‡æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™æ¸…é™¤ï¼Œæœ€å¾Œåˆ©ç”¨å…¨åŸŸ afterAll æœ€å¾ŒåŸ·è¡Œçš„ç‰¹æ€§ç¢ºèª userDB æ˜¯å¦å›åˆ°åˆå§‹ç‹€æ…‹ï¼š

測試成功，且最後全域的 afterAll 執行時， userDB 已無測試資料

æ—¢ç„¶æ˜¯æ¨¡æ“¬è³‡æ–™åº«ï¼Œä¸€å®šæœƒæœ‰ä¸€äº›å»¶é²æ™‚é–“ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ›¿ insertTestData å¢åŠ  setTimeout ï¼š

//åœ¨æ–°å¢æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™å¢åŠ  Timeout
const insertTestData = data=> {
    setTimeout(() => {
        userDB.push(data)
    },3000)
}

å…¶é¤˜ä¸è®Šçš„ç‹€æ³ä¸‹å†é€²è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼š

Received 的值是 undefined ，不符合期望

å› ç‚º Timeout å»¶é²çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œå° getUserData åŸ·è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦çš„æ™‚å€™ï¼Œæ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™é‚„æ²’æœ‰è¢« push é€² userDB è£¡é¢ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è³‡æ–™çš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹å‡½å¼å°±å›å‚³ undefined ï¼Œé€™å€‹çµæœä¸¦ä¸æ˜¯æ¸¬è©¦æ‰€æœŸæœ›çš„ã€‚

åœ¨ beforeAll ç­‰å‡½æ•¸ä¸­ï¼Œè™•ç†ç•°æ­¥åŸ·è¡Œæœ‰å¹¾ç¨®æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

ç¬¬ä¸€ç¨®æ˜¯ç•¶ insertTestData ä¸­å«æœ‰ callBack å‡½å¼æ™‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ done ä¾†è¨­ç½® beforeAll çš„å®Œæˆé»ï¼Œåªè¦æ²’æœ‰åŸ·è¡Œåˆ° done å°±ä¸æœƒé›¢é–‹ beforeAll ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚å°‡ insertTestData å’Œ beforeAll æ”¹æˆä¸‹æ–¹ï¼š

//å‚³å…¥ done åƒæ•¸

  3. è¢«å‚³å…¥ connection ä¸­çš„ socket ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è‡ªè¨‚ç›£è½ message çš„é¡å‹ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ getMessage å°±æ˜¯ç­†è€…è‡ªè¡Œè¨­å®šçš„é¡å‹åç¨±ï¼Œ socket.io åªæœƒè§¸ç™¼å°æ‡‰çš„ç›£è½ Functionã€‚

å¦‚æœä¸Šæ–¹æœ‰ä¸äº†è§£çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å…ˆå¤§ç•¥çœ‹éï¼Œé…åˆ Client çš„é‹ä½œä¸€èµ·çœ‹æœƒæ›´æ¸…æ¥šã€‚

å®Œæˆ Server çš„éƒ¨åˆ†å¾Œå¯ä»¥å…ˆè¼¸å…¥ä»¥ä¸‹æŒ‡ä»¤é‹è¡Œï¼š

Client

Client ç«¯å¦å¤–é–‹ä¸€å€‹å°ˆæ¡ˆï¼Œ React çš„ç’°å¢ƒå°±ä¸å†å¦å¤–è¬›è§£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åƒè€ƒã€Œwebpack&Reacté–‹ç™¼ç’°å¢ƒç¯‡(1)ã€å’Œã€Œwebpack&Reacté–‹ç™¼ç’°å¢ƒç¯‡(2)ã€ä¸Šä¸‹å…©ç¯‡æ­å»ºï¼Œé‚£é™¤äº† React çš„éƒ¨åˆ†é‚„éœ€è¦ä¸‹è¼‰ socket.io-client ï¼š

ä¸‹è¼‰å¾Œï¼Œå°±èƒ½é–‹å§‹å¯¦åšä¸€å€‹é€£çµ webSocket ä¸¦èƒ½å¤ ç™¼é€åŠæ¥æ”¶è¨Šæ¯çš„ component ï¼š

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'
import ReactDom from 'react-dom'
import webSocket from 'socket.io-client'

const Main = () => {
    const [ws,setWs] = useState(null)

    const connectWebSocket = () => {
        //é–‹å•Ÿ
        setWs(webSocket('http://localhost:3000'))
    }

    useEffect(()=>{
        if(ws){
            //é€£ç·šæˆåŠŸåœ¨ console ä¸­æ‰“å°è¨Šæ¯
            console.log('success connect!')
            //è¨­å®šç›£è½
            initWebSocket()
        }
    },[ws])

    const initWebSocket = () => {
        //å° getMessage è¨­å®šç›£è½ï¼Œå¦‚æœ server æœ‰é€é getMessage å‚³é€è¨Šæ¯ï¼Œå°‡æœƒåœ¨æ­¤è¢«æ•æ‰
        ws.on('getMessage', message => {
            console.log(message)

    }

    const sendMessage = () => {
        //ä»¥ emit é€è¨Šæ¯ï¼Œä¸¦ä»¥ getMessage ç‚ºåç¨±é€çµ¦ server æ•æ‰
        ws.emit('getMessage', 'åªå›å‚³çµ¦ç™¼é€è¨Šæ¯çš„ client')
    }

    return(
        <div>
            <input type='button' value='é€£ç·š' onClick={connectWebSocket} />
            <input type='button' value='é€å‡ºè¨Šæ¯' onClick={sendMessage} />
        </div>
    )
}

ReactDom.render(<Main />, document.getElementById('root'))

é—œæ–¼æ­¤ component çš„æ¶æ§‹å¯ä»¥åˆ†ç‚ºå¹¾ä¸‹å¹¾å¡Šï¼š

  1. ä½¿ç”¨ useState åœ¨ component å…§å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹ state ws ï¼Œç•¶ä½¿ç”¨è€…é»æ“Šã€Œé€£ç·šã€æŒ‰éˆ•æ™‚è§¸ç™¼ connectWebSocket ï¼Œè§¸ç™¼å¾Œé€éå¾ socket.io-client å¥—ä»¶ä¸­ import çš„ webSocket é€£ç·šè‡³å‰›å‰›åŸ·è¡Œ server.js çš„ http://localhost:3000 ï¼Œæœ€å¾Œ webSocket é€£ç·šæˆåŠŸå¾Œæœƒè—‰ç”± setWs å°‡ WebSocket ç‰©ä»¶å¯«åˆ° ws ã€‚
  2. é€£ç·šå¾Œ component çš„ state ws å°±æœƒæ”¹è®Šï¼Œç”Ÿå‘½é€±æœŸ useEffect ä¹Ÿæœƒè¢«è§¸ç™¼ï¼Œè§¸ç™¼æ™‚å…ˆåˆ¤æ–· ws å…§æ˜¯å¦çœŸçš„æœ‰å€¼ï¼Œå› ç‚º useEffect åœ¨çµ„ä»¶ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ render æ™‚å°±æœƒå…ˆåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œä½†é‚£æ™‚å€™ ws é‚„æ²’æœ‰é€£ç·šæ‰€ä»¥æ˜¯ null ï¼Œé€™æ™‚å€™é‚„å»åŸ·è¡Œ initWebSocket å°±æœƒç™¼ç”ŸéŒ¯èª¤ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¦‚æœ ws é‚„æ˜¯åˆå§‹å€¼ null å°±ä¸åŸ·è¡Œæ¥ä¸‹ä¾†çš„ initWebSocket ã€‚
  3. åœ¨ initWebSocket ä¸­æ›¿ ws å¢åŠ äº†ç›£è½ getMessage çš„è¨Šæ¯ï¼Œç•¶ Server æœ‰ç™¼é€ä»¥ getMessage ç‚ºåç¨±çš„è¨Šæ¯ï¼Œå°±æœƒåœ¨é€™è£¡è¢«æ•æ‰åˆ°ï¼Œä¸¦åœ¨ç¬¬äºŒå€‹åƒæ•¸ä¸­æ¥æ”¶è¨Šæ¯ï¼Œå°‡è¨Šæ¯å…§å®¹æ‰“å°åˆ° console ä¸­ã€‚
  4. ç•¶æˆ‘æŒ‰ä¸‹ã€Œé€å‡ºè¨Šæ¯ã€æŒ‰éˆ•æ™‚ï¼Œ sendMessage ä¸­æœƒä»¥ ws.emit é€å‡ºè¨Šæ¯ï¼Œè€Œé€å‡ºçš„é™¤äº†è¨Šæ¯å…§å®¹å¤–ï¼Œé‚„æœ‰è¾¨åˆ¥ä»–çš„åç¨± getMessage ã€‚

åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€é»ä¸­éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ ws://localhost:3000 æ˜¯ç„¡æ³•æ­£ç¢ºèˆ‡ Server åšconnection çš„ï¼Œå› ç‚º socket.io æœ¬èº«æ˜¯ http å”å®šè€Œä¸æ˜¯ WebSocket ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦çœ‹æ›´å¤šå”è­°å¯ä»¥åƒè€ƒ socket.io çš„å”è­°ã€‚

çœ‹åˆ°é€™è£¡ï¼Œå°±èƒ½å¤ å°‡å‰›å‰› Server çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼æ‹¿ä¾†èˆ‡ Client ä¸€èµ·è¬›è§£å…©é‚Šæºé€šçš„æµç¨‹äº†ï¼š

  1. ç”± Client ä»¥ ws.emit('getMessage','è¨Šæ¯å…§å®¹') å°‡è¨Šæ¯é€åˆ° Serverã€‚
  2. Server è—‰ç”± socket.on('getMessage',message=>{/*åŸ·è¡Œå‹•ä½œ*/}) æ•æ‰åˆ°è¨Šæ¯ã€‚
  3. Server è™•ç†å®Œè¨Šæ¯å…§å®¹å¾Œå†é€é socket.emit('getMessage','è¨Šæ¯å…§å®¹') å°‡è¨Šæ¯å‚³çµ¦ Client ã€‚
  4. æœ€å¾Œ Client æœƒå¾ ws.on('getMessage',message=>{/*åŸ·è¡Œå‹•ä½œ*/}) çš„ç›£è½å–å¾— Server å‚³ä¾†çš„è¨Šæ¯ã€‚

ä¸Šé¢çš„éç¨‹éƒ½æ˜¯ä»¥ getMessage ç‚ºè©²è¨Šæ¯å–åå­—å»é€å‡ºåŠç›£è½æ•æ‰ï¼Œå› æ­¤å°±ä¸æœƒåƒåŸç”Ÿçš„ WebSocket ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦ç‚ºè¨Šæ¯åšåˆ†é¡å°±é‚„å¾—å¤šåšåˆ¤æ–·ï¼Œç•¶ç„¶ç”¨ socket.io çš„æ–¹ä¾¿ä¸åªæœ‰é€™æ¨£å­è€Œå·²ï¼Œå…ˆçœ‹çœ‹ä¸Šæ–¹ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼çš„åŸ·è¡Œç•«é¢ï¼Œå†è¬›è§£æ›´å¤šæœ‰è¶£çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼š

Server 回傳從 Client 中收到的訊息

é€²éšç”¨æ³• - ç¾¤ç™¼

å°±ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ä¾‹å­è€Œè¨€ï¼Œçœ¼å°–çš„è®€è€…æ‡‰è©²æœ‰ç™¼ç¾ï¼Œç­†è€…åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ socket.emit() å°‡è¨Šæ¯å¾ Server å‚³çµ¦ Client çš„æ™‚å€™ï¼Œè¨Šæ¯å…§å®¹ç‚ºã€Œåªå›å‚³çµ¦ç™¼é€è¨Šæ¯çš„ client ã€ï¼Œé€™ä¹Ÿä»£è¡¨é€™æ®µè¨Šæ¯ä¸æœƒåŒæ™‚è®“å…¶ä»–é€£æ¥è‘—è©² WebSocket çš„ Client æ”¶åˆ°ï¼Œé‚£è©²æ€éº¼åšæ‰èƒ½è®“æ‰€æœ‰ Client éƒ½æ”¶åˆ°è¨Šæ¯å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

å…¶å¯¦ socket.io é‡å°è¦ç™¼é€çš„å°è±¡ï¼Œæä¾›äº†å…¶ä»–æ–¹å¼ï¼š

/*åªå›å‚³çµ¦ç™¼é€è¨Šæ¯çš„ client*/
socket.emit('getMessage', message)

/*å›å‚³çµ¦æ‰€æœ‰é€£çµè‘—çš„ client*/
io.sockets.emit('getMessageAll', message)

/*å›å‚³çµ¦é™¤äº†ç™¼é€è€…å¤–æ‰€æœ‰é€£çµè‘—çš„ client*/
socket.broadcast.emit('getMessageLess', message)

æ¯ç¨®æ–¹å¼ä¹Ÿéƒ½æœƒå›ºå®šå¸¶è‘—ä¸€å€‹åç¨±è¢« Client ç«¯ç›£è½æ¥æ”¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²’æœ‰çµ¦åç¨±å°±ä¸æœƒè¢«ç›£è½çµ¦æ•æ‰åˆ°ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹å¯¦ä½œå‘ˆç¾é€™ä¸‰ç¨®ç™¼é€è¨Šæ¯çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼š

Server

åœ¨ Server ç«¯è¦å› æ‡‰ä¸åŒçš„åç¨±ä¾†åˆ¤æ–·å›å‚³çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå› æ­¤ç‚ºå¹¾å€‹ä¸åŒçš„åç¨±åšåŠ å…¥ç›£è½ï¼š

io.on('connection', socket => {
  
    /*åªå›å‚³çµ¦ç™¼é€è¨Šæ¯çš„ client*/
    socket.on('getMessage', message => {
        socket.emit('getMessage', message)
    })

    /*å›å‚³çµ¦æ‰€æœ‰é€£çµè‘—çš„ client*/
    socket.on('getMessageAll', message => {
        io.sockets.emit('getMessageAll', message)
    })

    /*å›å‚³çµ¦é™¤äº†ç™¼é€è€…å¤–æ‰€æœ‰é€£çµè‘—çš„ client*/
    socket.on('getMessageLess', message => {

ç•¶ Client è¦èˆ‡ Server ä¸­æ–·é€£ç·šæ™‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ Client ç«¯ä½¿ç”¨ .close() é€™å€‹å‡½å¼ï¼Œä¸­æ–·å¾Œæœƒè§¸ç™¼åœ¨ Server ç«¯çš„ disconnect é€™å€‹åç¨±çš„äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸­æ–·å¾Œä¾¿ç„¡æ³•å†é€éæ­¤é€£çµé€å‡ºè¨Šæ¯åˆ°å…¶ä»– Client é€šçŸ¥ã€ŒæŸä½¿ç”¨è€…å·²é›¢é–‹ã€ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸‹æ–¹å…ˆé€éé€å‡ºä¸€å€‹è¨Šæ¯åˆ° Server ï¼Œç­‰é€šçŸ¥å®Œå…¶ä»– Client å¾Œï¼Œå†é€è¨Šæ¯åˆ°æå‡ºä¸­æ–·é€£ç·šçš„ Client åŸ·è¡Œ .close() ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹å¯¦ä½œï¼š

item.description: å‰è¨€ å‰å¹¾å¤© React é‡‹å‡º 16.8 ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„æ¶ˆæ¯åœ¨å„ç¾¤çµ„ä¸Šå‚³å¾—æ²¸æ²¸æšæšï¼Œç†ç”±æ˜¯å› ç‚ºé€™ä¸€æ¬¡çš„æ”¹ç‰ˆæ–°å¢äº† Hooks ï¼Œè®“ Function Components è®Šå¾—å’Œä»¥å¾€ä¸åŒï¼ ä»€éº¼æ˜¯ Hooks ï¼Ÿ åœ¨æåˆ° Hooks å‰ï¼Œå¿…é ˆå…ˆç†è§£ React åœ¨ 16.â€¦
item.content:encoded:
å‰è¨€

å‰å¹¾å¤© React é‡‹å‡º 16.8 ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„æ¶ˆæ¯åœ¨å„ç¾¤çµ„ä¸Šå‚³å¾—æ²¸æ²¸æšæšï¼Œç†ç”±æ˜¯å› ç‚ºé€™ä¸€æ¬¡çš„æ”¹ç‰ˆæ–°å¢äº† Hooks ï¼Œè®“ Function Components è®Šå¾—å’Œä»¥å¾€ä¸åŒï¼

ä»€éº¼æ˜¯ Hooks ï¼Ÿ

åœ¨æåˆ° Hooks å‰ï¼Œå¿…é ˆå…ˆç†è§£ React åœ¨ 16.8 ç‰ˆæœ¬å‰æ’°å¯« Component çš„å…©ç¨®æ–¹å¼ï¼š

  1. Function Components ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ function ä¾†å®£å‘Šï¼Œä½œç‚ºå‡½å¼ä»–æ¥æ”¶ props åšåƒæ•¸ï¼Œä¸¦å›å‚³ä¸€å€‹ React çš„ DOM å…ƒç´ ã€‚
  2. Class Components ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ ES6 çš„ Class èªæ³•ç³–å‰µå»ºä¸€å€‹ React ä¸‹çš„å­é¡åˆ¥ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯è—‰ç”± React å…§çš„ render å‡½å¼å›å‚³ DOM å…ƒç´ ã€‚

åŸºæœ¬ä¸Šå…©ç¨®æ–¹å¼å‰µå»ºå‡ºä¾†çš„ DOM æ²’æœ‰ä¸åŒï¼Œå·®åˆ¥åœ¨æ–¼ Class Components æ“æœ‰è‡ªèº«çš„ State ï¼ˆç‹€æ…‹ï¼‰åŠ Lifecycle ï¼ˆç”Ÿå‘½é€±æœŸï¼‰ã€‚

ä½†è¨˜å¾—å—ï¼Ÿå°±åƒæˆ‘ä¸Šæ–¹æåˆ°çš„ï¼Œé€™æ˜¯ React åœ¨ 16.8 ç‰ˆæœ¬å‰çš„äº‹æƒ…äº†ï¼Œ Hooks çš„å‡ºç¾ï¼Œæ”¹è®Šäº† Function Components ï¼Œè®“ä»–æ“æœ‰å°ˆå±¬çš„ useState å’Œ useEffect ä¾†ç®¡ç†ç‹€æ…‹åŠçš„ç”Ÿå‘½é€±æœŸã€‚

Hooks ä½¿ç”¨

å®‰è£/æ›´æ–°æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬

é¦–å…ˆå°‡åŸæœ‰æˆ–æ–°å°ˆæ¡ˆçš„ React ç‰ˆæœ¬å‡ç´šç‚º 16.8 ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¯é€éä»¥ä¸‹æŒ‡ä»¤å®‰è£æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š

npm install react

æˆ–è€…å°‡åŸæœ‰ç‰ˆæœ¬å‡ç´šï¼š

npm update react

å‡ç´šå¾Œä¾¿å¯ä»¥åœ¨ react ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ Hooks çš„æ–°åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'

ç®¡ç† State

å°±å¦‚ä¸Šæ‰€èªªï¼Œæ–°ç‰ˆåŠ å…¥çš„ Hooks å¯ä»¥ç‚º Function Components ç”³è£ State çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€™å€‹å…¶ä¸­ä¸€å€‹æ ¸å¿ƒå…¨éƒ½æ­¸å’æ–¼ useState ã€‚

åœ¨ä»¥å¾€çš„ Class Components ä¸­ç®¡ç† State ï¼Œéœ€åœ¨ constructor ä¸­åšåˆå§‹è¨­ç½®ï¼Œä¹‹å¾Œä¾¿å¯ä½¿ç”¨ this.setState æ›´æ–° State çš„å…§å®¹ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

import React from 'react'

class Todo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props){
        super(props)
        
        //è¨­ç½® state
        this.state = {
            listName: 'default value'
        }
        this.changeListName = this.changeListName.bind(this)
    }

    changeListName(e){
        //æ”¹è®Š state
        this.setState({listName: e.target.value},
            ()=>{console.log(this.state)})
    }

    render(){
        return(
            <input value={this.state.listName} onChange={this.changeListName} />
        )
    }
}

ä½¿ç”¨äº† Hooks å¾Œçš„ Function Components å‰‡ä»¥ useState é€²è¡Œç®¡ç†ï¼Œ Hooks ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š

import React, { useState } from 'react'

const Todo = props => {
    //è¨­ç½® state
    const [listName, setListName] = useState('default value')

    //æ”¹è®Š state
    const changeListName = e =>{
        setListName(e.target.value) 
        console.log(listName)
    }

    return (
        <input value={listName} onChange={changeListName} />
    )
}

å…©ç¨®ç‰ˆæœ¬å‘ˆç¾çš„çµæœéƒ½ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œå·®åˆ¥åœ¨æ–¼è¨­ç½®åŠä¿®æ”¹ State çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ä½¿ç”¨ Hooks çš„ useState å‰µå»ºï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„ Hooks æ˜¯ Function Components å°ˆå±¬çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œåœ¨ Class Components ä¸­ç„¡æ³•ä½¿ç”¨ Hooks ã€‚

const [listName, setListName] = useState('default value')

useState æœƒå›å‚³ä¸€å€‹é™£åˆ—ï¼Œé™£åˆ—ä¸­åˆ†åˆ¥æ˜¯ã€Œä¿ç®¡ State å€¼çš„è®Šæ•¸ï¼ˆ listName ï¼‰ã€å’Œã€Œæ›´æ–° State çš„å‡½å¼ï¼ˆ setListName ï¼‰ã€ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨æ¥æ”¶å›å‚³çš„å€¼æ™‚ï¼Œ React é¸æ“‡ä½¿ç”¨äº† ES6 è§£æ§‹è³¦å€¼çš„æ–¹å¼è™•ç†ã€‚

å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ä¸€å€‹è®Šæ•¸å»æ¥æ”¶çš„è©±ï¼Œå‰‡æœƒè®Šæˆï¼š

const listName = useState('default')listName[0] //listName çš„å€¼listName[1] //ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ setListName å‡½å¼

Hooks å¯ä»¥å¤šæ¬¡ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯å„ç¨®å‹æ…‹è¨­ç½® State ï¼ŒåŒ…å«ã€Œç‰©ä»¶ã€ã€ã€Œé™£åˆ—ã€ç­‰ç­‰ï¼š

//string
const [listName, setListName] = useState('default value')

//object
const [list, setList] = 
      useState({ key: 1, name: 'é è¨­äº‹é …' })

//array
const [todoList, setTodoList] = 
      useState([{ key: 1, name: 'é è¨­äº‹é …' },
                { key: 2, name: 'é è¨­äº‹é …2' }])

ä½¿ç”¨ State æ™‚ï¼Œä¸éœ€ä»¥ this.state.listName ä¾†å–å€¼ï¼Œåœ¨ Function Components ä¸­ç›´æ¥ä»¥ listName å°±å¯ä»¥å–åˆ° State å€¼äº†ã€‚

æ›´æ–°æ™‚ä¹Ÿä¸å¿…åƒ this.setState({listName:value}) ä½¿ç”¨ç‰©ä»¶åšæ›´æ–°ï¼Œå› ç‚ºæ¯å€‹ State éƒ½ç”±ä¸€å€‹ useState å‰µå»ºï¼Œå› æ­¤åªéœ€è¦ç›´æ¥æŠŠè¦æ›´æ–°çš„å€¼çµ¦å°æ‡‰çš„æ›´æ–°å‡½å¼è™•ç†ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ setListName(value) ã€‚

äº†è§£ Lifecycle

æ—¢ç„¶æœ‰äº† State ï¼Œé‚£ç•¶ State æ”¹è®Šæ™‚èƒ½ä¸èƒ½åŒæ™‚åŸ·è¡Œäº›äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œç•¶ç„¶ï¼ Hooks å¦ä¸€å€‹æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½ useEffect ï¼Œåœ¨ Function Components ä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨å®ƒå‰µå»ºç”Ÿå‘½é€±æœŸã€‚

åœ¨ Class Components ä¸­ï¼Œæœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å¹¾ç¨®æ–¹å¼å¯ä»¥åœ¨å„å€‹é€±æœŸçš„æ™‚å€™åŸ·è¡Œé¡å¤–çš„äº‹ä»¶ï¼š

  1. componentDidMount ï¼šåœ¨ component å°‡ DOM çµ¦ render è‡³ç•«é¢å¾ŒåŸ·è¡Œã€‚
  2. componentDidUpdate ï¼šç•¶ component çš„ State æ”¹è®Šæ™‚åŸ·è¡Œã€‚
  3. componentWillUnmount ï¼šç•¶ component è¢«ç§»é™¤æ™‚åŸ·è¡Œã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯ Function Components è£¡åªéœ€è¦ä¸€å€‹ useEffect ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å°‡ä¸‰å€‹é¡˜æœ›ä¸€æ¬¡æ»¿è¶³ï¼š

const Todo = props => {
    //è¨­ç½® state
    const [listName, setListName] = useState('default value')

    //æ”¹è®Š state
    const changeListName = e =>{
        setListName(e.target.value) 
    }

    //è¨­ç½® lifecycle
    useEffect(()=>{
        //componentDidMount åŠ componentDidUpdate
        console.log(`æ›´æ–°å¾Œçš„ State ${listName}`)

        //componentDidUpdate åŠ componentWillUnmount
        return(()=>{
            console.log(`æ›´æ–°å‰çš„ State ${listName}`)
        })
    })

    return (
        <input value={listName} onChange={changeListName} />
    )
}

é€™è£¡å¯èƒ½æœƒæœ‰è¨±å¤šäººå° useEffect æ„Ÿåˆ°å›°æƒ‘ï¼Œå®ƒåˆ°åº•æ˜¯æ€éº¼é‹ä½œçš„ï¼Ÿå¯ä»¥å…ˆçœ‹ä¸Šæ–¹çš„åŸ·è¡Œçµæœå¾Œå†æ¥è‘—è§£é‡‹ï¼š

åœ¨ Function Components åŸ·è¡Œ render å¾Œä¾¿æœƒå…ˆåŸ·è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ useEffect ï¼š

首次 render 時執行的生命週期

æ¥è‘—ç•¶ State æ”¹è®Šæ™‚æœƒå…ˆåŸ·è¡Œ useEffect ä¸­ return çš„å…§å®¹å¾Œï¼Œå†åŸ·è¡Œ useEffect ï¼š

State 每次改變都觸發 useEffect

ç”±ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ gif å¯ä»¥ç™¼ç¾ï¼Œç•¶æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡æ”¹è®Š State æ™‚éƒ½æœƒåŸ·è¡Œå…©æ¬¡ç”Ÿå‘½é€±æœŸå…§çš„äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå…ˆæ˜¯åŸ·è¡Œ return ï¼Œå†åŸ·è¡Œ useEffect å…§çš„ã€‚

ç¶“éå¯¦æ¸¬ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŠŠ useEffect åˆ†æˆä¸‰å€‹éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š

Function Components 的生命週期

  1. æ©˜è‰²æ¡†æ¡†çš„å…§å®¹ç‚º componentDidMount ï¼Œæœƒåœ¨ render å¾ŒåŸ·è¡Œã€‚
  2. ç¶ è‰²æ¡†æ¡†çš„å…§å®¹ç‚º componentWillUnmount ï¼Œæœƒåœ¨ components ç§»é™¤æ™‚åŸ·è¡Œã€‚
  3. ç´…è‰²æ¡†æ¡†çš„å…§å®¹ç‚º componentDidUpdate ï¼Œæœƒåœ¨ State æ”¹è®Šæ™‚åŸ·è¡Œï¼ŒåŸ·è¡Œé †åºç‚ºç¶ è‰²æ¡†æ¡†åˆ°æ©˜è‰²æ¡†æ¡†ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯å¦‚æœ Component ä¸­åªéœ€åœ¨ render å¾ŒåŸ·è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ç²å–è³‡æ–™çš„å‹•ä½œï¼Œè©²æ€éº¼åƒ Class Components çš„ componentDidMount ä¸€æ¨£å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

å…¶å¯¦ useEffect å¯ä»¥æœ‰ç¬¬äºŒå€‹åƒæ•¸ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦åœ¨ useEffect çš„ç¬¬äºŒå€‹åƒæ•¸ä¸­è¨­ç½®ä¸€å€‹ç©ºé™£åˆ— [] ï¼Œä¸”ä¸éœ€è¦åŠ å…¥ return çš„å‡½å¼ï¼Œä¾¿å¯ä»¥è®“ useEffect åªåœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡çš„ render å¾ŒåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œå°±å¦‚åŒ componentDidMount ï¼š

useEffect(()=>{
    console.log(`åªåŸ·è¡Œç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡`)
},[])

useEffect çš„ç¬¬äºŒå€‹åƒæ•¸ä¸åªæ˜¯èƒ½å‚³ç©ºé™£åˆ—ï¼Œåœ¨é™£åˆ—ä¸­å¯ä»¥è¨­ç½®ä¸€å€‹ä»¥ä¸Šçš„ State åç¨±ï¼Œè®“ç”Ÿå‘½é€±æœŸåªè§¸ç™¼åœ¨ç‰¹å®šçš„ State æ”¹è®Šæ™‚ï¼š

useEffect(()=>{
    console.log(`åªåŸ·è¡Œç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å’Œ listName æ”¹è®Šçš„æ™‚å€™`)
},[listName])

ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯èªªï¼Œç•¶ listName çš„å€¼ç‚º â€˜Default valueâ€™ ï¼Œè€Œä¸‹ä¸€å€‹å€¼ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ â€˜Default valueâ€™ æ™‚ï¼Œé‚£ useEffect å°±ä¸æœƒè¢«è§¸ç™¼ï¼Œå› ç‚ºä¿®æ”¹å‰å¾Œçš„å€¼éƒ½ç›¸åŒï¼Œé™¤é listName è¢«æ›´æ”¹ç‚º â€˜Default valueâ€™ å¤–çš„å€¼ã€‚

æœ€å¾Œï¼Œç­†è€…ä½¿ç”¨ Hooks å‰µå»ºä¸€å€‹ç°¡å–®çš„ todolist ï¼Œç•¶ä¸­åŒ…å«äº† useState åŠ useEffect ï¼š

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'

const Todo = props => {
    const [listName, setListName] = useState('')
    const [todoList, setTodoList] = useState([{ key: 1, name: 'é è¨­äº‹é …' }])
    const [time, setTime] = useState(new Date())

    const addTodo = () => {
        const newKey = todoList.length === 0 ? 1 : todoList[todoList.length - 1].key + 1
        setTodoList([...todoList, { key: newKey, name: listName }])
        setListName('')
    }

    const removeTodo = (listKey) => {
        let foundIndex = todoList.findIndex((list) => {
            return list.key === listKey
        })
        todoList.splice(foundIndex, 1)
        setTodoList([...todoList])
    }

    useEffect(() => {
        const timer = setInterval(tickTime, 1000)

        return (() => {
            clearInterval(timer)
        })
    }, [])

    const tickTime = () => {
        setTime(new Date())
    }

    return (
        <div>
            <p>
                {time.toString()}
            </p>
            <input value={listName} onChange={e => setListName(e.target.value)} />
            <input type='button' value='æ–°å¢' onClick={addTodo} />
            {todoList.map((list) => {
                return (
                    <p key={list.key}>
                        <input type='button' value='ç§»é™¤' onClick={() => { removeTodo(list.key) }} />
                        {list.name}
                    </p>
                )
            })}
        </div>
    )
}

export { Todo }

ä¸Šæ–¹ä»¥ useState è¨­ç½® listName ç®¡ç†å¾…è¾¦äº‹é …çš„åç¨±ã€ todoList ç‚ºäº‹é …å…§å®¹ã€ setTodoList ç”¨ä¾†æ–°å¢/ç§»é™¤ä»£è¾¦äº‹é …ï¼Œæ™‚é–“é¡¯ç¤ºå‰‡æ˜¯ç”¨ useEffect åœ¨ Todo ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ render çš„æ™‚å€™åŸ·è¡Œ setInterval æ¯ç§’æ›´æ–°ï¼Œä¸”æœƒåœ¨ç§»é™¤ components æ™‚åŸ·è¡Œ return çš„ cleanInterval ä¾†åœæ­¢ï¼š

useState 增加/移除事項，useEffect 為顯示時間

æœ¬æ–‡ä»‹ç´¹äº†åœ¨ React æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸­å¢åŠ çš„ Hooks å…¶ä¸­å…©å€‹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œåœ¨é–±è®€å®˜æ–¹æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ™‚å€™é‚„æœ‰è¨±å¤šæ»¿æœ‰è¶£çš„ Hooks ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ç›¸ä¼¼ Redux çš„ useReducer å’Œè‡ªå®šç¾©çš„ Hooks ï¼Œä»Šå¾Œæœƒå†æŒçºŒåˆ†äº«ä¸€äº›å­¸ç¿’çš„éç¨‹ã€‚

å¦‚æœæ–‡ç« ä¸­æœ‰ä»»ä½•å•é¡Œï¼Œæˆ–æ˜¯ä¸ç†è§£çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œéƒ½å¯ä»¥ç•™è¨€å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘ï¼è¬è¬å¤§å®¶ï¼

åƒè€ƒæ–‡ç«

å‰è¨€

çœ‹èµ·ä¾†å¾ˆæ£’ï¼å°å§ï¼Ÿä½†é‚£éƒ½æ˜¯å¹¾å¹´å‰äº†ã€‚

æ¨¡çµ„åŒ–ï¼ˆNPM & Moduleï¼‰

è¿‘å¹´å‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹åœ¨ç¶²é ä¸Šè¶Šä¾†è¶Šåƒé‡ï¼ŒæŠ•å…¥å‰ç«¯æ¡†æ¶çš„é–‹ç™¼è€…ï¼ˆDeveloperï¼‰è®Šå¤šï¼Œè®“ä»¥å‰ä¸€é»¨ç¨å¤§çš„ JQuery é–‹å§‹è¢«å¤šå€‹è¨±å¤šå°åŠŸèƒ½çš„æ¡†æ¶çµ¦å–ä»£ï¼Œå› ç‚º JQuery æ“æœ‰å¤ªå¤šç¶²ç«™ä¸­ç”¨ä¸åˆ°çš„ function ï¼Œä½†ä»–å€‘ä¾ç„¶æœƒè¢«è¼‰å…¥åˆ°ç¶²é ä¸­ã€‚

é¢è‡¨ä¸Šè¿°ä¾›çµ¦å¤§æ–¼éœ€æ±‚çš„æƒ…æ³ï¼Œè¨±å¤šäººä¾¿ç´›ç´›é¸æ“‡åªæ“æœ‰è‡ªå·±éœ€è¦åŠŸèƒ½çš„å°æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæ¸›å°‘åœ¨ Client ç«¯è¼‰å…¥éå¤šå¤šé¤˜çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ã€‚

é€™äº›è¶¨å‹¢é–“æ¥è®“æ’°å¯«åŸç”Ÿ JavaScript çš„äººç›´ç·šå¢é•·ï¼Œå¾ ES6 é–‹å§‹å‡ºç¾çš„ Promise ã€ Class è¨±å¤šæ–°åŸç”Ÿçš„èªæ³•å‡ºç¾ï¼Œçµ‚æ–¼æœ‰ä¸€å¤©ï¼Œ XMLHttpRequest() è«‹æ±‚é–‹å§‹èµ°å…¥æ­·å²äº†ï¼ˆæˆ–æ˜¯æ ¹æœ¬æ²’äººèªè­˜ä»–XDï¼‰â€¦

Fetch

Fetch æ˜¯ ES6 çš„æ–°èªæ³•ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯æ­é… Promise ï¼ˆPromise çš„åŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³•ï¼‰ä¾†åŸ·è¡Œè«‹æ±‚ç¶²ç«™å’Œè«‹æ±‚å¾Œç²å– Response çš„è™•ç†æ–¹å¼ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹ç¯„ä¾‹çš„è«‹æ±‚éƒ½æœƒå¾ httpbin.org é€™å€‹ç¶²ç«™è£¡æŒ‘é¸ï¼Œå®ƒæä¾›äº†å„ç¨®ä¸åŒçš„è«‹æ±‚æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåœ¨ç·´ç¿’æ™‚æ˜¯å€‹å¾ˆæ£’çš„å·¥å…·ã€‚

GET

GET æ˜¯è«‹æ±‚ä¸­æœ€åŸºæœ¬çš„é¡å‹ï¼Œåœ¨ Fetch ä¸­é è¨­çš„è«‹æ±‚é¡å‹ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ GET ç”¨èµ·ä¾†å°±åƒä¸‹æ–¹ï¼š

    .then((response) => {

Fetch æ¥æ”¶äº†ä¸€å€‹ url ä½œåƒæ•¸ï¼Œä¸¦ç”¨ then æ¥æ”¶æ­¤æ¬¡è«‹æ±‚çš„ç›¸é—œè³‡è¨Šï¼š

關於該次請求的 response 內容

ä¸€å€‹æ˜¯ä¸Šæ–¹ then ä¸­ return ä½¿ç”¨çš„ .json() ï¼Œèƒ½å¤ å°‡å›å‚³çš„è³‡æ–™ä»¥ç‰©ä»¶çš„æ–¹å¼å‚³çµ¦ç¬¬äºŒå€‹ then æ¥æ”¶ï¼Œå¦ä¸€å€‹æ˜¯ .text() ï¼Œç•¶å›å‚³çš„è³‡æ–™ç„¡æ³•è½‰æ›ç‚ºç‰©ä»¶æ™‚ï¼Œå‰‡æœƒå°‡è«‹æ±‚è³‡æ–™ä»¥å­—ä¸²æ–¹å¼å–å‡ºã€‚

用 .json() 將 response 的請求資料取出

用 .text() 將 response 的請求資料取出

POST

èˆ‡ GET ä¸åŒçš„æ˜¯ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ POST è«‹æ±‚æ™‚éœ€å¦å¤–åœ¨ method å±¬æ€§å…§æŒ‡å®š POST æ–¹å¼ï¼Œä¸”å¤šäº† body å±¬æ€§æŒ‡å®šè¦é€å‡ºçš„è³‡æ–™ï¼š

    method: 'POST',

Fetch åœ¨æœªæŒ‡å®šè«‹æ±‚æ–¹å¼çš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹éƒ½æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ GET ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ GET æœ¬èº«ç„¡æ³•åœ¨è«‹æ±‚ä¸­è—‰ç”± body é€å‡ºè³‡æ–™ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨æœ‰ body å±¬æ€§çš„ç‹€æ…‹ä¸‹ï¼Œæœªæ›¿ method æŒ‡å®šç‚º POST æˆ–å…¶ä»–å¯å¸¶ body çš„è«‹æ±‚æ–¹å¼æ™‚ï¼Œæœƒå‡ºç¾ä»¥ä¸‹éŒ¯èª¤ï¼š

éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œ body å…§çš„è³‡æ–™éœ€ä½¿ç”¨ JSON.stringify å°‡ç‰©ä»¶è½‰æ›æˆå­—ä¸²å‹æ…‹ï¼Œå¦å‰‡ server ç«¯æœƒç„¡æ³•æ­£ç¢ºå–å¾—è³‡æ–™ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ data é€é€² server çš„å·®åˆ¥ï¼š

未使用 JSON.stringify

使用了 JSON.stringify

æœªä½¿ç”¨ JSON.stringify çš„è«‹æ±‚æœƒç›´æ¥å°‡ç‰©ä»¶å¼·åˆ¶è½‰ç‚ºå­—ä¸²ï¼Œè®Šæˆ [object Object] é€è‡³ server ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨äº†æ­£ç¢ºè½‰æ›çš„è«‹æ±‚åœ¨ server ç«¯å‰‡æ˜¯èƒ½æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ­£ç¢ºçš„å…§å®¹ã€‚

è«‹æ±‚å¤±æ•—

åœ¨ Fetch ä¸­ï¼Œè«‹æ±‚å¤±æ•—æ™‚ä¸æœƒæœ‰åƒ $.ajax ä¸­æœ‰ error å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥æ•æ‰ï¼Œå–è€Œä»£ä¹‹çš„æ˜¯è¦ä»¥ response çš„ status çš„å±¬æ€§å€¼åˆ¤æ–·ï¼Œç•¶ status çš„å€¼ä¸ç­‰æ–¼ 200 æ™‚ï¼Œå°‡åœ¨ .then ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ throw å‰µå»ºä¸€å€‹éŒ¯èª¤ï¼Œä¸¦ç”± .catch æ¥æ”¶éŒ¯èª¤å…§å®¹è™•ç†ï¼š

}).then((response) => {

æœ¬æ–‡ä»‹ç´¹äº† Fetch çš„åŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³•åŠè«‹æ±‚éŒ¯èª¤æ™‚çš„æ•æ‰æ–¹å¼ï¼Œé›–ç„¶å¯«èµ·ä¾†æœªå¿…æ¯” $ajax é‚„è¦ç°¡å–®ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¾æ­¤ä»¥å¾Œä¹Ÿå¤šäº†ä¸éœ€æ›è¼‰ JQuery è½‰ç‚ºä½¿ç”¨åŸç”Ÿè«‹æ±‚çš„é¸æ“‡ï¼Œå”¯ä¸€éœ€è¦è€ƒé‡çš„æ˜¯ Fetch å’Œ Promise åœ¨ç€è¦½å™¨ä¸Šçš„æ”¯æ´åº¦é‚„å¤ªä½ï¼Œç•¶æ›åˆ° IE æ™‚ä¾¿å®Œå…¨ç„¡æ³•ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

ä¸éå°±å¦‚å‰è¨€æ‰€èªªçš„ï¼Œç›®å‰æŠ•å…¥å‰ç«¯æ¡†æ¶çš„é–‹ç™¼è€…æœ‰å¤ªå¤šäº†ï¼Œå°‡ä¾†ä¹Ÿæœƒä»‹ç´¹ç­†è€…ç›®å‰å°è™•ç†è«‹æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¡†æ¶ axios ï¼Œ axios çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼å’Œ Fetch å¤§åŒå°ç•°ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸è€ƒæ…® Promise çš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹ï¼Œå¤§å¹…åº¦æé«˜äº†ç€è¦½å™¨çš„æ”¯æ´æ€§ï¼Œè‡³å°‘åœ¨ IE11 ä¸Šä¹Ÿè®Šå¾—èƒ½å¤ ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæœ‰èˆˆè¶£å¯ä»¥å…ˆè‡³ GitHub ä¸ŠæŸ¥çœ‹æ–‡æª”ã€‚

item.description: åŸºæœ¬åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®å‰µå»º ç‚º Line Bot å»ºç«‹åŸºæœ¬çš„åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®å…¶å¯¦ä¸é›£ï¼Œåœ¨ Line ç‚ºæ¯å€‹é–‹ç™¼è€…æä¾›çš„ç®¡ç†ä»‹é¢ï¼ˆ Line Developers ï¼‰å°±æœ‰é€™å€‹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š å»ºç«‹é¸å–®çš„ä»‹é¢ä¹Ÿå¾ˆç°¡æ˜“ï¼š Step1. é¸æ“‡åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®çš„ç‰ˆå‹ï¼Œç›®å‰å®˜æ–¹æä¾›äº†ä¸ƒç¨®æ¨£å¼å¯ä¾›é¸æ“‡ï¼š Stepâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
åŸºæœ¬åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®å‰µå»º

ç‚º Line Bot å»ºç«‹åŸºæœ¬çš„åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®å…¶å¯¦ä¸é›£ï¼Œåœ¨ Line ç‚ºæ¯å€‹é–‹ç™¼è€…æä¾›çš„ç®¡ç†ä»‹é¢ï¼ˆ Line Developers ï¼‰å°±æœ‰é€™å€‹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

å»ºç«‹é¸å–®çš„ä»‹é¢ä¹Ÿå¾ˆç°¡æ˜“ï¼š

Step1. é¸æ“‡åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®çš„ç‰ˆå‹ï¼Œç›®å‰å®˜æ–¹æä¾›äº†ä¸ƒç¨®æ¨£å¼å¯ä¾›é¸æ“‡ï¼š


Step2. ä¸Šå‚³åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®çš„åœ–ç‰‡åŠé»æ“Šå›ºå®šå€åŸŸæ™‚æ‰€åŸ·è¡Œçš„äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šç™¼é€è¨Šæ¯ã€è·³è½‰é€£çµç­‰ç­‰ï¼š

上傳圖文選單的圖片及設定點擊時的事件

ä¸Šæ–¹å…©å€‹æ­¥é©Ÿå®Œæˆå¾Œï¼Œä¾¿èƒ½å¾—åˆ°ä¸€å€‹æ¨™æº–çš„åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®ï¼š

使用版型一創建的簡易圖文選單

å„˜ç®¡å®˜æ–¹æä¾›äº†ç°¡æ˜“çš„å¾Œå°æ“ä½œã€ä¸ƒç¨®é¸å–®çš„ç‰ˆå‹ï¼Œè®“è¨±å¤šäººéƒ½å¯ä»¥åœ¨çŸ­æ™‚é–“å…§å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹ç¬¦åˆè‡ªå·±éœ€æ±‚çš„åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯é€™çµ‚ç©¶ç„¡æ³•æ»¿è¶³æ‰€æœ‰äººã€‚

å»ºç«‹ Rich menus

å¦‚ä¸Šæ–¹æ‰€èªªï¼Œç‚ºäº†è®“å®¢æˆ¶åœ¨ Line Bot ä¸Šç°¡åŒ–æ“ä½œï¼Œå› æ­¤å°‡åŠŸèƒ½ç½®æ–¼åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®ï¼Œé€éé»æ“Šä¾†å®Œæˆäº‹æƒ…æ˜¯å¾ˆé‡è¦çš„ã€‚

åƒæ˜¯åœ¨äº‹ä»¶æ•¸é‡å¤§æ–¼ 6 å€‹ï¼ˆå®˜æ–¹æä¾›çš„æœ€å¤šå¯è¨­å®šäº‹ä»¶æ•¸ï¼‰çš„æƒ…æ³ï¼š

此圖文選單的按鈕區塊多達九個

æˆ–æ˜¯éœ€è¦ä¸è¦å‰‡çš„ç‰¹æ®Šæ’åˆ—ï¼ˆå®˜æ–¹æä¾›çš„ç‰ˆå‹éƒ½æ˜¯å›ºå®šåˆ‡å‰²çš„ï¼‰ï¼Œå®˜æ–¹ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

不規則的按鈕擺放方式

ä»¥ä¸Šå…©ç¨®åœ–æ–‡é¸å–®çš„é¡å‹ï¼ˆ Rich menus ï¼‰ï¼Œéƒ½ç„¡æ³•ä»¥å®˜æ–¹æä¾›çš„ä»‹é¢å¯¦ç¾ï¼Œå¿…é ˆå¦å¤–ä½¿ç”¨ API è™•ç†ã€‚

ä¸‹æ–¹çš„ç¯„ä¾‹æœƒä½¿ç”¨ Python å’Œä»–çš„ç·šä¸Šç·¨è¼¯å™¨ Jupyter ï¼Œå†æ­é… Line æä¾›çš„ API å¥—ä»¶ line-bot-sdk-python å¯¦ä½œã€‚

æ–°å¢ Rich menus

é€éç™¼é€ä¸€å€‹ request è«‹æ±‚åˆ° https://api.line.me/v2/bot/richmenu å‰µå»º Rich menus ï¼Œè©²æ¬¡è«‹æ±‚éœ€è¦åœ¨ headers ä¸­çš„ Authorization å±¬æ€§å…§å¸¶ä¸Šè©² Line Bot çš„ Token å€¼ï¼Œ body å…§å‰‡æ˜¯é—œæ–¼é¸å–®çš„è¨­ç½®ï¼Œä¸‹æ–¹æœƒå†è©³ç´°èªªæ˜ Token è©²åœ¨å“ªå–å¾—åŠ body çš„è¨­å®šå…§å®¹ï¼Œæ•´å€‹è«‹æ±‚çš„æ¨£è²Œæœƒåƒé€™æ¨£ï¼š

import requests
import json

headers = {"Authorization":"Bearer 3Ma92PMIfy790Z...","Content-Type":"application/json"}

body = {
    "size": {"width": 2500, "height": 1686},
    "selected": "true",
    "name": "Controller",
    "chatBarText": "Controller",
    "areas":[
        {
          "bounds": {"x": 551, "y": 325, "width": 321, "height": 321},
          "action": {"type": "message", "text": "up"}
        },
        {
          "bounds": {"x": 876, "y": 651, "width": 321, "height": 321},
          "action": {"type": "message", "text": "right"}
        },
        {
          "bounds": {"x": 551, "y": 972, "width": 321, "height": 321},
          "action": {"type": "message", "text": "down"}
        },
        {
          "bounds": {"x": 225, "y": 651, "width": 321, "height": 321},
          "action": {"type": "message", "text": "left"}
        },
        {
          "bounds": {"x": 1433, "y": 657, "width": 367, "height": 367},
          "action": {"type": "message", "text": "btn b"}
        },
        {
          "bounds": {"x": 1907, "y": 657, "width": 367, "height": 367},
          "action": {"type": "message", "text": "btn a"}
        }
    ]
  }

req = requests.request('POST', 'https://api.line.me/v2/bot/richmenu', 
                       headers=headers,data=json.dumps(body).encode('utf-8'))

print(req.text)

æ¯å€‹ Line Bot çš„ Token éƒ½å¯ä»¥åœ¨é–‹ç™¼äººå“¡ä»‹é¢ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°ï¼š

如果這裡還沒有 Token 可以點選 Issue 產生

body æ˜¯æœ‰é—œ Rich menus çš„è¨­ç½®å…§å®¹ï¼Œä»–æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å¹¾å€‹å±¬æ€§ï¼š

  1. size ï¼šç›®å‰å¯¬åº¦åƒ…èƒ½è¨­ç½® 2500 ï¼Œé«˜åº¦æœ‰ 843 æˆ– 1686 å…©ç¨®é¸æ“‡ã€‚
  2. selected ï¼šæ§åˆ¶ Rich menus æ˜¯å¦é è¨­é–‹å•Ÿï¼Œ true åŠ false è«‹ä½¿ç”¨å­—ä¸²æ ¼å¼ã€‚
  3. name ï¼šç‚ºè©² Rich menus çš„åç¨±ã€‚
  4. chatBarText ï¼šåœ–æ–‡é¸å–®ä¸‹æ–¹çš„æ–‡å­—å…§å®¹ï¼Œé»æ“Šå¯é–‹é—œé¸å–®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¨­ç½®ç‚ºã€Œé»æˆ‘æ”¶åˆé¸å–®ã€ã€‚

å—¨ï¼å¤§å®¶å¥½æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¥Qè¶…äººï¼å…ˆå‰ä¸€é™£å­ç¶“éå‹äººä»‹ç´¹èªè­˜äº†é€™å€‹ç¶²ç«™ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç”±æ–¼å…ˆå‰å·²ç¶“æœ‰ç”¨ç¿’æ…£åˆ†äº«æ–‡ç« çš„å¹³å°ï¼Œå°±é²é²æœªåˆ°æ­¤è™•ç™¼æ–‡ï¼Œä¸€ç›´åˆ°åƒèˆ‡å®Œè©²å¹³å°èˆ‰è¾¦çš„éµäººè³½å¾Œï¼Œä¼‘æ¯äº†å¥½ä¸€é™£å­ï¼Œæœ€å¾Œæ²’æœ‰å¾—çä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¾ˆå¤±è½ï¼Œæ–¼æ˜¯æƒ³èªªåœ¨æ–°çš„ä¸€å¹´è®“è‡ªå·±æœ‰å€‹æ–°é–‹å§‹ï¼è«‹å¤§å®¶å¤šå¤šæŒ‡æ•™ï¼

èªè­˜ Promise

Promise æ˜¯åœ¨ ES6 å‡ºç¾çš„èªæ³•ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯é‡å° JavaScript ä¸­éåŒæ­¥çš„åŸ·è¡Œç·’åšåŒæ­¥è™•ç†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå…ˆä¾†èªè­˜ä¸€ä¸‹éåŒæ­¥æ˜¯ä»€éº¼æ„æ€ã€‚

éåŒæ­¥

éåŒæ­¥è™•ç†æ–¹å¼æœƒåœ¨ä¸ç­‰å¾…æ¯ä¸€è¡Œçš„ç¨‹å¼åŸ·è¡Œå®Œæˆçš„ç‹€æ…‹ä¸‹ä¸æ–·å‘ä¸‹ä¸€è¡ŒåŸ·è¡Œï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š

ä»¥ä¸Šçš„ç¨‹å¼å€æ®µæœƒä»¥ä¸‹åˆ—çš„é †åºåšåŸ·è¡Œï¼š

  1. å®£å‘Šå­—ä¸² strï¼Œä¸¦æŒ‡æ´¾å€¼ç‚º initã€‚

  3. ä½¿ç”¨ setTimeout åœ¨ä¸‰ç§’å¾ŒåŸ·è¡Œ func æ”¹è®Š str çš„å€¼ã€‚
  4. åœ¨ console ä¸­å°å‡ºå­—ä¸² str çš„å€¼ã€‚

é—œéµå°±åœ¨ä¸Šæ–¹çš„ç¬¬ 3 å’Œç¬¬ 4 æ­¥ï¼Œåœ¨å°å‡º console.log æ™‚ï¼Œç¨‹å¼ä¸¦ä¸æœƒç­‰åˆ° setTimeout åŸ·è¡Œå®Œï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ JacaScript ç¢ºèªåœ¨ç¬¬ 3 æ­¥çš„ setTimeout æ™‚ï¼Œå°±æœƒç¹¼çºŒå‘ä¸‹åŸ·è¡Œç¨‹å¼ï¼Œç›´åˆ°ä¸‰ç§’å¾Œæ‰å›éé ­åŸ·è¡Œ func æ”¹è®Š str çš„å€¼ã€‚

é›–ç„¶ä½¿ç”¨éåŒæ­¥å¯ä»¥è®“åŸ·è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦ä¸æœƒå› ç‚ºæŸä¸€è¡Œç¨‹å¼è€Œå¡ä½æ•´å€‹é é¢ï¼Œä½†æœ‰æ™‚å€™é‚„æ˜¯å¾—å…ˆåˆ©ç”¨ ajax ç²å–è³‡æ–™ï¼Œå†ç¹¼çºŒåŸ·è¡Œè™•ç†è³‡æ–™çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ã€‚

åˆ°é€™è£¡æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æœ‰é»ç†Ÿæ‚‰ï¼Ÿæ—©åœ¨å¹¾å¹´å‰ä½¿ç”¨ JQuery çš„ ajax é€å‡ºè«‹æ±‚æ™‚å°±æ“æœ‰äº† async é€™å€‹å±¬æ€§ä¾†è™•ç†é€™å€‹ç‹€æ³ï¼Œç•¶ä»–è¢«è¨­å®šç‚º false é—œé–‰éåŒæ­¥æ™‚ï¼Œå°±å¾—ç­‰ ajax å¾—åˆ°å›æ‡‰å¾Œï¼Œæ‰æœƒç¹¼çºŒåŸ·è¡Œä¸‹æ–¹çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ï¼Œå°±åƒä¸‹æ–¹ä¾‹å­ï¼š

let data = {};

//ä½¿ç”¨ async å°‡ ajax è«‹æ±‚æ”¹ç‚ºåŒæ­¥ã€‚

  url: '',

ä½†å› ç¾ä»Šå‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹åœ¨ç¶²é ä¸­çš„ä»½é‡è¶Šä¾†è¶Šé‡çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œéœ€è¦è™•ç†åŒæ­¥è™•ç†çš„åœ°æ–¹ä¹Ÿè¶Šä¾†è¶Šå¤šï¼Œ Promise å°±é€™æ¨£èª•ç”Ÿäº†ã€‚

Promise åŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³•

å¦‚ä¸Šæ®µæ‰€èªªï¼Œ Promise æ˜¯ç”¨ä¾†è™•ç†åŒæ­¥çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå†èªªæ˜ç”¨æ³•å‰å…ˆä¾†ç”¨åœ–ç‰‡ç°¡å–®ç­è§£ä¸€ä¸‹åŸç†ï¼š

圖片來源：https://developer.mozilla.org

ä¸Šåœ–ç‚º Promise çš„ç”Ÿå‘½é€±æœŸï¼Œæ¯å€‹ Promise éƒ½æœƒç¶“é pending ç‹€æ…‹ï¼Œåœ¨ pending å¾Œåˆ†åˆ¥æœƒæœ‰æˆåŠŸæ™‚èµ°å‘çš„çš„ fulfill ï¼ŒåŠå¤±æ•—æ™‚çš„ reject ï¼Œä¸¦é€é .then() åœ¨æˆåŠŸæ™‚æ¥è‘—è™•ç†è³‡æ–™ï¼Œæˆ–æ˜¯ä»¥ .catch() åšå¤±æ•—æ™‚çš„æ‡‰å°ï¼Œç•¶ç„¶ï¼ä¸è«–æ˜¯å“ªä¸€æ¢è·¯ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å† return ä¸€å€‹æ–°çš„ Promise å»¶çºŒè™•ç†ã€‚

ç¾åœ¨ï¼Œä¾†å¯¦ä½œä¸€å€‹åŸºæœ¬çš„ Promise ï¼š

const newPromise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    if (Math.random() > 0.5) {
      resolve('changed');
    }
    reject('error');
  }, 3000);
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
}).catch((error) => {
  console.log(error);
});

ä¸Šæ–¹çš„åœ¨ setTimeout å…§åŠ ä¸Šäº† Math.random() å–äº‚æ•¸ï¼ˆæœƒå›å‚³ 0~1 ä¹‹é–“çš„å€¼ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸¦è—‰ç”±åˆ¤æ–·è©²äº‚æ•¸æ˜¯å¦å¤§æ–¼ 0.5 ä¾†æ¨¡æ“¬å…©ç¨®æƒ…æ³ï¼Œç•¶å¤§æ–¼æ™‚ä»£è¡¨æˆåŠŸï¼Œå°æ–¼æ™‚ä»£è¡¨å¤±æ•—ï¼Œç•¶ç„¶ï¼ .catch ä¹Ÿå’Œ .then ç›¸åŒï¼Œåœ¨æ²’æœ‰ Promise å…§çš„ reject å‘¼å«ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸æœƒåŸ·è¡Œçš„ã€‚

Promise é€²éšç”¨æ³•

ç¶“éåŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³•ï¼ŒçŸ¥é“äº† .then èƒ½å¤ åœ¨ Promise ä¸­ä»¥ resolve åšåŒæ­¥çš„åŸ·è¡Œå‘¼å«ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ .then æœ¬èº«ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ“æœ‰å›å‚³å€¼ï¼Œä¸¦ç”±ä¸‹ä¸€å€‹ .then åšæ¥æ”¶ï¼Œç¹¼çºŒåŸ·è¡Œï¼š

const newPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {
  setTimeout(() => { resolve('changed'); }, 3000);
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);  // 'changed'
  return 'last changed';
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);  // 'last changed'
});

ç¬¬äºŒå€‹ .then æœƒæ¥æ”¶ä¸Šä¸€å€‹ .then çš„å›å‚³å€¼ï¼Œä¸¦å°‡å®ƒå°å‡ºï¼Œä½†æ˜¯éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œé€™ç¨®å¤šå€‹ .then çš„ç”¨æ³•ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸é©ç”¨æ–¼åŒæ­¥åŸ·è¡Œï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯èªªåªè¦è„«é›¢äº† Promise å°±æœƒå›åˆ°éåŒæ­¥ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ä»¥ä¸‹ä¾‹å­ï¼š

const newPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {
  setTimeout(() => { resolve('changed'); }, 3000);
}).then((data) => {
  let newData = data;
  setTimeout(
    () => { newData = 'last changed'; }, 2000);
  return newData;
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data); // 'changed'
});

ä¸Šæ–¹ä¾‹å­åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹ .then ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ setTimeout åœ¨ 2 ç§’å¾Œæ”¹è®Š newData çš„å€¼ä¸¦å°‡ä»–å›å‚³ï¼Œä½†åŸ·è¡Œå¾Œæœƒç™¼ç¾ï¼Œåœ¨ç¬¬äºŒå€‹ .then ä¸­å‡ºç¾åœ¨ console ä¸Šçš„é‚„æ˜¯èˆŠå€¼ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸æœƒç­‰åˆ° setTimeout åŸ·è¡Œå®Œå¾Œæ‰æ¥è‘—ä¸‹ä¸€å€‹ .thenã€‚

å¦å¤–æˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥å›å‚³å¦ä¸€å€‹ Promiseï¼Œä¾†è§£æ±ºä¸Šæ–¹çš„å•é¡Œï¼š

const lastPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {
  setTimeout(() => { resolve('last changed'); }, 2000);
});

const newPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {
  setTimeout(() => { resolve('changed'); }, 3000);
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
  return lastPromise.then(lastData => lastData);
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data); // 'last changed'
});

const newPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {
  setTimeout(() => { resolve('changed'); }, 3000);
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
  // ç¬¬äºŒå€‹Promise
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    setTimeout(() => { resolve(`last ${data}`); }, 2000);
  }).then(lastData => lastData);
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data); // 'last changed'
});
